sentences.english: His two albums released on cassette have sold 10 million copies.
sentences.chinese: 他以磁带形式发行的两张专辑已售出1000万份。

detailed_translations.english: a small flat plastic case containing  magnetic tape  , that can be used for playing or recording sound

name: tape
trans: n. 胶带；磁带；带子；卷尺 vt. 录音；用带子捆扎；用胶布把…封住 vi. 用磁带录音

sentences.english: a photo stuck to the wall with tape
sentences.chinese: 用胶布贴在墙上的照片

detailed_translations.english: a narrow length of plastic that is sticky on one side and is used to stick things together

detailed_translations.chinese: 录音；用带子捆扎；用胶布把…封住
detailed_translations.english: to record sound or pictures onto a tape

name: binary
trans: adj. [数] 二进制的；二元的，二态的

sentences.english: a binary star system
sentences.chinese: 双星系

detailed_translations.chinese: [数] 二进制的；二元的，二态的
detailed_translations.english: a system of counting, used in computers, in which only the numbers 0 and 1 are used

name: digital
trans: n. 数字；键 adj. 数字的；手指的

sentences.english: digital TV
sentences.chinese: 数字电视

sentences.english: a digital signal
sentences.chinese: 数字信号

sentences.english: a digital camera
sentences.chinese: 数码照相机

sentences.english: digital recording
sentences.chinese: 数字录音

detailed_translations.english: using a system in which information is recorded or sent out electronically in the form of numbers, usually ones and zeros

name: wireless
trans: n. 无线电 adj. 无线的；无线电的 vt. 用无线电报与…联系；用无线电报发送 vi. 打无线电报；打无线电话

sentences.english: ...the fast-growing wireless communication market.
sentences.chinese: …快速增长的无线通讯市场。

detailed_translations.english: Wireless technology uses radio waves rather than electricity and therefore does not require any wires
a radio

detailed_translations.chinese: 用无线电报与…联系；用无线电报发送
打无线电报；打无线电话

name: high-definition
trans: adj. 非常鲜明的

sentences.english: Back then, such a high-definition TV would set you back around $1, 500.
sentences.chinese: 那时候，买这样一台高清晰度电视机要花上大概1,500美元。

detailed_translations.english: a high-definition television or computer shows images very clearly

name: audio
trans: adj. 声音的；[声] 音频的，[声] 声频的

sentences.english: audio and video equipment
sentences.chinese: 音频视频设备

detailed_translations.chinese: 声音的；[声] 音频的，[声] 声频的
detailed_translations.english: relating to sound that is recorded or broadcast

name: vision
trans: n. 视力；美景；眼力；幻象；想象力；幻视（漫威漫画旗下超级英雄） vt. 想象；显现；梦见

sentences.english: She suffered temporary loss of vision after being struck on the head.
sentences.chinese: 她头部受撞击以后出现暂时性失明。

sentences.english: Tears blurred her vision (= made it difficult for her to see ).
sentences.chinese: 泪水模糊了她的视线。

sentences.english: The idea came to her in a vision.
sentences.chinese: 她在神示中想到了这个主意。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to see

name: fantasy
trans: n. 幻想；白日梦；幻觉 adj. 虚幻的 vt. 空想；想像 vi. 耽于幻想；奏幻想曲（等于phantasy）

sentences.english: I used to have fantasies about living in Paris with an artist.
sentences.chinese: 我过去常幻想着在巴黎与一位艺术家同住。

sentences.english: sexual fantasies
sentences.chinese: 性幻想

sentences.english: Young children sometimes can’t distinguish between fantasy and reality.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子有时不能区分幻想与现实。

sentences.english: He lived in a fantasy world of his own, even as a small boy.
sentences.chinese: 甚至还是个小孩子的时候，他就生活在一个幻想世界里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 想象， 幻想； 想象的产物
detailed_translations.english: an exciting and unusual experience or situation you imagine happening to you, but which will probably never happen

name: science fiction
trans: n. 科幻小说；科幻电影

sentences.english: So real that some people are asking whether science fiction should now be converted into science fact.
sentences.chinese: 同样现实的是很多人疑问是否科幻小说现在应该转换成科技事实了。

sentences.english: This scene is science fiction now, but it might not be for much longer.
sentences.chinese: 现在这种情景仅仅是科幻小说，但不久的将来很可能成为现实。

detailed_translations.english: stories about events in the future which are affected by imaginary developments in science, for example about travelling in time or to other  planets  with life on them

name: pump
trans: n. 泵，抽水机；打气筒 vt. 打气；用抽水机抽… vi. 抽水

sentences.english: water/air/beer etc pump (=for moving water, air etc)
sentences.chinese: 抽水机/抽气机/啤酒泵等

sentences.english: It's not enough to get rid of raw sewage by pumping it out to sea.
sentences.chinese: 仅用水泵将未经处理的污水排入海中是不够的。

sentences.english: The money raised will be used to dig bore holes to pump water into the dried-up lake.
sentences.chinese: 筹到的钱款将用来挖井眼，再将水抽入干涸的湖中。

detailed_translations.english: a machine for forcing liquid or gas into or out of something
to make liquid or gas move in a particular direction, using a pump

name: generator
trans: n. 发电机；发生器；生产者

sentences.english: an emergency generator
sentences.chinese: 应急发电机

sentences.english: The company has been a very good cash generator.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司是台非常出色的赚钱机器。

detailed_translations.english: a machine that produces electricity

name: gear
trans: n. 齿轮；装置，工具；传动装置 adj. 好极了 vt. 开动；搭上齿轮；使……适合；使……准备好 vi. 适合；搭上齿轮；开始工作

sentences.english: His mountain bike had 18 gears.
sentences.chinese: 他的山地自行车有18挡。

sentences.english: Andy drove cautiously along in third gear.
sentences.chinese: 安迪挂着三挡小心地行驶。

sentences.english: Does this thing have a reverse gear?
sentences.chinese: 这玩意儿有倒挡吗？

sentences.english: Any cyclist can climb a difficult hill; you just change gear.
sentences.chinese: 谁都能骑上难爬的山坡，只要换挡就行了。

sentences.english: Don’t turn off the engine while you’re still in gear.
sentences.chinese: 还挂着挡的时候不要关发动机。

sentences.english: It’s a good habit to take the car out of gear while you’re at a stoplight.
sentences.chinese: 等红灯时换空挡的习惯很好。

sentences.english: Colleges are not always geared to the needs of mature students.
sentences.chinese: 大学并不总是去适应成年学生的需要。

sentences.english: My training was geared toward winning gold.
sentences.chinese: 我的训练是为赢得金牌去规划的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 齿轮，传动装置，排挡；用具，设备；衣服
detailed_translations.english: the machinery in a vehicle such as a car, truck, or bicycle that you use to go comfortably at different speeds
If someone or something is geared to or toward a particular purpose, they are organized or designed in order to achieve that purpose

name: pivot
trans: n. 枢轴；中心点；旋转运动 adj. 枢轴的；关键的 vt. 以…为中心旋转；把…置于枢轴上 vi. 在枢轴上转动；随…转移

sentences.english: Forming the pivot of the exhibition is a large group of watercolours.
sentences.chinese: 构成这个展览核心的是一大批水彩画。

detailed_translations.english: a central point or pin on which something balances or turns

detailed_translations.chinese: 以…为中心旋转；把…置于枢轴上
detailed_translations.english: to turn or balance on a central point, or to make something do this

name: hydraulic
trans: adj. 液压的；水力的；水力学的

sentences.english: a hydraulic pump
sentences.chinese: 水压泵，液压泵

sentences.english: hydraulic brakes
sentences.chinese: 液压制动器

detailed_translations.chinese: 液压的；水力的；水力学的
detailed_translations.english: moved or operated by the pressure of water or other liquid

name: drainage
trans: n. 排水；排水系统；污水；排水面积

sentences.english: A handful of pebbles in the bottom of a flowerpot will help drainage.
sentences.chinese: 在花盆底下放一把鹅卵石能够帮助排水。

sentences.english: a plan to improve the town’s drainage system
sentences.chinese: 改善城里排水系统的计划

detailed_translations.english: the process or system by which water or waste liquid flows away

name: sewage
trans: n. 污水；下水道；污物

sentences.english: Chlorine is used in sewage treatment.
sentences.chinese: 氯被用于污水处理。

sentences.english: The factory secretly dumped millions of gallons of raw sewage (= sewage that had not been treated ) into the Ohio river.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂偷偷地把几百万加仑未经处理的污水排放进了俄亥俄河。

detailed_translations.english: the mixture of waste from the human body and used water, that is carried away from houses by pipes under the ground

name: ventilation
trans: n. 通风设备；空气流通

sentences.english: I see no ventilation to speak of, none from a window or a ventilator at least.
sentences.chinese: 我看不到通风设备，连窗户或至少一个通风扇也没有。

sentences.english: There is not a single pane of glass anywhere around the site, and the only mechanical ventilation installed is in the gallery.
sentences.chinese: 基地内的任何地方都没有单一的玻璃窗格，而且唯一的机械通风设备安装在了画廊中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 通风设备； 空气流通

name: compress
trans: vt. 压缩，压紧；精简 vi. 受压缩小

sentences.english: Light silk is best for parachutes, as it compresses well and then expands rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 轻质丝绸最适合制作降落伞，因为这种面料便于压缩，而且展开迅速。

sentences.english: Isobel nodded, her lips compressed.
sentences.chinese: 伊索贝尔紧闭着双唇点了点头。

sentences.english: The miners used rock drills and compressed air to drive through hard rock.
sentences.chinese: 矿工使用钻岩机和压缩空气来凿穿坚硬的岩石。

detailed_translations.english: to press something or make it smaller so that it takes up less space, or to become smaller
a small thick piece of material that you put on part of someone’s body to stop blood flowing out or to make it less painful

name: condense
trans: vt. 使浓缩；使压缩 vi. 浓缩；凝结

sentences.english: This whole chapter could be condensed into a few paragraphs.
sentences.chinese: 这一整章可以压缩成几个段落。

detailed_translations.english: to make something that is spoken or written shorter, by not giving as much detail or using fewer words to give the same information

name: refine
trans: vt. 精炼，提纯；改善；使…文雅

sentences.english: Oil is refined to remove naturally occurring impurities.
sentences.chinese: 油经过提炼去除天然生成的杂质。

detailed_translations.english: When a substance is refined, it is made pure by having all other substances removed from it

name: simplify
trans: vt. 简化；使单纯；使简易

sentences.english: an attempt to simplify the tax system
sentences.chinese: 简化税制的尝试

sentences.english: The law needs to be simplified.
sentences.chinese: 这部法律需要简化。

sentences.english: a simplified version of the game
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏的简化版

detailed_translations.english: to make something easier or less complicated

name: purify
trans: vt. 净化；使纯净 vi. 净化；变纯净

sentences.english: chemicals used to purify the water
sentences.chinese: 用于净化水质的化学品

detailed_translations.english: to remove dirty or harmful substances from something

name: filter
trans: n. 滤波器；[化工] 过滤器；筛选；滤光器 vt. 过滤；渗透；用过滤法除去 vi. 滤过；渗入；慢慢传开

sentences.english: The water in the tank is constantly filtered.
sentences.chinese: 鱼缸里的水在不停地被过滤。

sentences.english: The ozone layer filters harmful UV rays from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 臭氧层过滤掉有害的太阳紫外线。

sentences.english: coffee filter papers
sentences.chinese: 咖啡滤纸

sentences.english: filter cigarettes (= with a filter at the end )
sentences.chinese: 过滤嘴香烟

detailed_translations.english: to remove unwanted substances from water, air etc by passing it through a special substance or piece of equipment
something that you pass water, air etc through in order to remove unwanted substances and make it clean or suitable to use

name: distil
trans: vt. 蒸馏；提取…的精华；使渗出 vi. 蒸馏；提炼；渗出

sentences.english: The whisky had been distilled in 1926 and sat quietly maturing until 1987.
sentences.chinese: 这瓶威士忌是1926年被蒸馏的，存放至1987年酿造成熟。

detailed_translations.english: If a liquid such as whisky or water is distilled, it is heated until it changes into steam or vapour and then cooled until it becomes liquid again. This is usually done in order to make it pure.

name: mode
trans: n. 模式；方式；风格；时尚

sentences.english: the most efficient mode of transport
sentences.chinese: 最高效的运输方式

sentences.english: Set the monitor to 256 colour mode.
sentences.chinese: 把显示器调成256色彩模式。

detailed_translations.english: a particular way or style of behaving, living or doing something

name: mould
trans: vi. 发霉 vt. 浇铸；用泥土覆盖 n. 模具；霉

sentences.english: Clothes mould in wet weather.
sentences.chinese: 天气潮湿时衣服会发霉。

sentences.english: Such oil can contain carcinogens and toxic mould.
sentences.chinese: 这种油可能包含致癌物和有毒的霉。

detailed_translations.english: to become or cause to become covered with this growth
a hollow container that you pour a liquid or soft substance into, so that when it becomes solid, it takes the shape of the container

name: prototype
trans: n. 原型；标准，模范

sentences.english: How do you test the prototype of the vending machine?
sentences.chinese: 你如何测试一个自动售货机的原型?。

sentences.english: What is the difference between these prototype declaration?
sentences.chinese: 这些原型声明的区别是什么？

sentences.english: But how do you come up with the architecture for this evolutionary prototype?
sentences.chinese: 但是你将如何为这个进化的原型提出系统的架构呢？

detailed_translations.english: the first form that a new design of a car, machine etc has, or a model of it used to test the design before it is produced

name: framework
trans: n. 框架，骨架；结构，构架

sentences.english: We have to act within the existing legal framework.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须在现行的法律框架下行事。

detailed_translations.english: a set of ideas, rules, or beliefs from which something is developed, or on which decisions are based

name: aspect
trans: n. 方面；方向；形势；外貌

sentences.english: a south-facing aspect
sentences.chinese: 朝南方向

detailed_translations.english: one part of a situation, idea, plan etc that has many parts

name: phase
trans: n. 月相 n. （月亮的）盈亏 n. 时期

sentences.english: a new drug that is in the experimental phase
sentences.chinese: 处于试验阶段的一种新药

sentences.english: It’s just a phase he’s going through.
sentences.chinese: 这只是他要经历的一个阶段。

detailed_translations.english: one of the stages of a process of development or change

name: operate
trans: vi. 运转；动手术；起作用 vt. 操作；经营；引起；对…开刀

sentences.english: The whole tax system is now operating more efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 现在整个税收制度运作效率更高了。

sentences.english: The new law doesn’t operate in our favour.
sentences.chinese: 这项新法规对我们不利。

sentences.english: The car parks operate a pay-as-you-leave system.
sentences.chinese: 这些停车场按“离开时付费”的模式运作。

sentences.english: The bus company operates a Monday to Saturday service.
sentences.chinese: 这家公共汽车公司周一至周六运营。

detailed_translations.english: if a system, process, or service operates, or if you operate it, it works
to use and control a machine or equipment

name: facilitate
trans: vt. 促进；帮助；使容易

sentences.english: The new trade agreement should facilitate more rapid economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 新贸易协定应当会加快经济发展。

sentences.english: Structured teaching facilitates learning.
sentences.chinese: 有条理的教导有利于学习。

detailed_translations.english: to make an action or a process possible or easier

name: transform
trans: vt. 改变，使…变形；转换 vi. 变换，改变；转化

sentences.english: Increased population has transformed the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 人口的增加使景观发生了变化。

detailed_translations.english: to completely change the appearance, form, or character of something or someone, especially in a way that improves it

name: convert
trans: n. 皈依者；改变宗教信仰者 vt. 使转变；转换…；使…改变信仰 vi. 转变，变换；皈依；改变信仰

sentences.english: a 19th-century converted barn
sentences.chinese: 由19世纪谷仓改建的房子

detailed_translations.english: to change something into a different form, or to change something so that it can be used for a different purpose or in a different way

name: alter
trans: vt. 改变，更改 vi. 改变；修改

sentences.english: Her face hadn’t altered much over the years.
sentences.chinese: 过了这么多年，她的容貌并没有多大改变。

sentences.english: The city centre has altered beyond recognition (=  changed very much  ) .
sentences.chinese: 市中心变得都认不出来了。

sentences.english: Nothing can alter the fact that the refugees are our responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 我们有责任帮助难民，这一事实无法改变。

detailed_translations.english: to change, or to make someone or something change

name: shift
trans: n. 移动；变化；手段；轮班 vt. 转移；改变；替换 vi. 移动；转变；转换

sentences.english: They need to shift from farming to industry, and they need to do so desperately.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要从农业领域转移到工业领域。 他们需要拼命地那么做。

sentences.english: the shift from one type of economic system to another
sentences.chinese: 从一种经济体系向另一种经济体系的转变

detailed_translations.english: to change a situation, discussion etc by giving special attention to one idea or subject instead of to a previous one
a change in the way people think about something, in the way something is done etc

name: turn
trans: n. 转弯；变化；(损害或有益于别人的)行为，举动，举止 vi. 转向；转变；转动 vt. 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换

sentences.english: Ricky turned and walked away.
sentences.chinese: 里基转身走了。

sentences.english: She turned her head in surprise.
sentences.chinese: 她惊讶地转过头来。

sentences.english: Brigitte glared at him, turned on her heel (= turned away suddenly because of anger ) , and stomped out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 布丽吉特瞪了他一眼，猛地一转身，噔噔噔地走出了房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换
detailed_translations.english: to move your body so that you are looking in a different direction

detailed_translations.chinese: 转弯；变化；(损害或有益于别人的)行为，举动，举止
detailed_translations.english: a sudden or unexpected change that makes a situation develop in a different way

name: adapt
trans: vi. 适应 vt. 使适应；改编

sentences.english: The ability to adapt is a definite asset in this job.
sentences.chinese: 适应能力是做这份工作的绝对有利条件。

sentences.english: Many children buy books after they have been adapted for television.
sentences.chinese: 许多小孩子都是在书被改编成电视剧之后才去买的。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually change your behaviour and attitudes in order to be successful in a new situation

name: adjust
trans: vt. 调整，使…适合；校准 vi. 调整，校准；适应

sentences.english: They’ll soon settle in – kids are very good at adjusting.
sentences.chinese: 他们很快就会习惯的——小孩子适应能力很强。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually become familiar with a new situation
to change or move something slightly to improve it or make it more suitable for a particular purpose

name: pinpoint
trans: n. 针尖；精确位置；极小之物 vt. 查明；精确地找到；准确描述 adj. 精确的；详尽的

sentences.english: New satellites will allow cars to pinpoint their position within an inch .
sentences.chinese: 新的卫星系统将让汽车精确他们的位置到每一英寸。

sentences.english: The feature could, for example, pinpoint areas being threatened by a quickly approaching tornado and alert residents of impending danger via their computers or cell phones.
sentences.chinese: 例如，精确地定位正遭受龙卷风攻击的区域并通过计算机和手机警告危险地区的人们。

detailed_translations.english: to find or show the exact position of something
a very small area or  dot  of something

name: accurate
trans: adj. 精确的

sentences.english: The brochure tries to give a fair and accurate description of each hotel.
sentences.chinese: 该手册尽量公正、准确地介绍每一家酒店。

detailed_translations.english: correct and true in every detail

name: precise
trans: adj. 精确的；明确的；严格的

sentences.english: precise sales figures
sentences.chinese: 准确的销售数据

sentences.english: It was difficult to get precise information.
sentences.chinese: 很难得到确切的消息。

sentences.english: ‘She’s a lot older than you, isn’t she?’ ‘Fifteen years, to be precise .’
sentences.chinese: “她比你大很多，是不是？”“准确地说，大了15岁。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 精确的， 准确的； 严谨的
detailed_translations.english: precise information, details etc are exact, clear, and correct

name: correct
trans: adj. 正确的；恰当的；端正的 vt. 改正；告诫 vi. 调整；纠正错误

sentences.english: If my calculations are correct, we’re about ten miles from Exeter.
sentences.chinese: 如果我计算得没错的话，我们离埃克塞特大约十英里。

sentences.english: Score one point for each correct answer .
sentences.chinese: 答对一题得一分。

sentences.english: You are absolutely correct, the Missouri is the longest river in the US.
sentences.chinese: 你说的完全正确，密苏里河是美国最长的河流。

sentences.english: Some eyesight problems are relatively easy to correct.
sentences.chinese: 有些视力问题比较容易矫正。

detailed_translations.english: having no mistakes
to make something right or to make it work the way it should

name: error
trans: n. 误差；错误；过失

sentences.english: There must be an error in our calculations.
sentences.chinese: 我们的计算肯定有错。

detailed_translations.english: a mistake

name: mistake
trans: n. 错误；误会；过失 vt. 弄错；误解 vi. 弄错；误解

sentences.english: The most common mistake is to plant them too deep.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的错误就是把它们种得太深了。

sentences.english: She mistook my meaning entirely.
sentences.chinese: 她完全误解了我的意思。

detailed_translations.english: something that has been done in the wrong way, or an opinion or statement that is incorrect
to understand something wrongly

name: flaw
trans: n. 瑕疵，缺点；一阵狂风；短暂的风暴；裂缝，裂纹 v. 使生裂缝，使有裂纹；使无效；使有缺陷 vi. 生裂缝；变的有缺陷

sentences.english: A design flaw (= a mistake or weakness in the way something was made ) caused the engine to explode.
sentences.chinese: 一个设计缺陷导致了引擎爆炸。

detailed_translations.english: a mistake, mark, or weakness that makes something imperfect

name: wrong
trans: n. 坏事；不公正 adj. 错误的；失常的；不适当的 vt. 委屈；无理地对待；诽谤 adv. 错误地；邪恶地，不正当地

sentences.english: You’ve spelt my name wrong.
sentences.chinese: 你把我的名字拼错了。

sentences.english: What? Have I done it wrong ?
sentences.chinese: 什么？我做得不对吗？

sentences.english: I asked him to sort those files, but he’s done it all wrong (= in completely the wrong way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我让他整理这些文件，可是他弄得根本不对。

sentences.english: I must have added it up wrong, then.
sentences.chinese: 那我一定是加错了。

sentences.english: It looks like it's spelled wrong.
sentences.chinese: 看起来像是拼错了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误地；邪恶地，不正当地
detailed_translations.english: not in the correct way
behaviour that is not morally right

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误的；失常的；不适当的
detailed_translations.english: not correct, and not based on true facts
Wrong is also an adverb

name: fault
trans: n. 故障；[地质] 断层；错误；缺点；毛病；（网球等）发球失误 vt. （通常用于疑问句或否定句）挑剔 vi. 弄错；产生断层

sentences.english: I’m really sorry - it’s all my fault.
sentences.chinese: 我真的很抱歉——都是我的错。

sentences.english: I didn’t sleep well that night, but it was my own fault .
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上我没有睡好，但这是我自己的问题。

detailed_translations.english: if something bad that has happened is your fault, you should be blamed for it, because you made a mistake or failed to do something

name: stumble
trans: n. 绊倒；蹒跚而行 vi. 踌躇，蹒跚；失足；犯错 vt. 使…困惑；使…绊倒

sentences.english: In her hurry, she stumbled and spilled the milk all over the floor.
sentences.chinese: 匆忙中她绊了一下，把牛奶洒得满地都是。

sentences.english: I make it into the darkness with only one stumble.
sentences.chinese: 我只踉跄了一下就把它弄进了黑暗中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 跌， 绊；结结巴巴地说话
detailed_translations.english: to hit your foot against something or put your foot down awkwardly while you are walking or running, so that you almost fall
Stumble is also a noun

name: contingency
trans: n. 偶然性；[安全] 意外事故；可能性；[审计] 意外开支；[离散数学或逻辑学]偶然式

sentences.english: a contingency plan
sentences.chinese: 应变计划

sentences.english: Add up your outgoings, putting on a bit more for contingencies.
sentences.chinese: 把你的经常性开支加起来，再增加些钱用于意外开支。

detailed_translations.chinese: 偶然性， 可能性； 意外事件； 附带事件
detailed_translations.english: an event or situation that might happen in the future, especially one that could cause problems

name: circumstance
trans: n. 环境，情况；事件；境遇

sentences.english: The Soviet Union had been forced by circumstances to sign a pact with Nazi Germany.
sentences.chinese: 苏联为形势所迫同纳粹德国签订了一项条约。

sentences.english: I can’t imagine a circumstance in which I would be willing to steal.
sentences.chinese: 我无法想象我在什么情况下会愿意去偷东西。

sentences.english: Grants are awarded according to your financial circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 补助金根据经济状况发给。

detailed_translations.english: the conditions that affect a situation, action, event etc

name: culture
trans: n. 文化，文明；修养；栽培 vt. [细胞][微] 培养（等于cultivate）

sentences.english: We speak Danish at home so that the boys don’t lose touch with their language and culture.
sentences.chinese: 我们在家说丹麦语，这样男孩子们就不会脱离他们的语言和文化。

sentences.english: In our culture, it is rude to ask someone how much they earn.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的文化里，问别人收入多少是不礼貌的。

sentences.english: I love working abroad and meeting people from diffe-rent cultures.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在国外工作，认识来自不同文化的人。

detailed_translations.english: the beliefs, way of life, art, and customs that are shared and accepted by people in a particular society

name: civilisation
trans: n. （英）文明（等于civilization）

sentences.english: Perhaps intelligence and civilisation are not what we should be concentrating on.
sentences.chinese: 也许智能和文明不属于我们应该关注的问题。

sentences.english: If I have understood you correctly, you are proposing to do nothing to prevent the likely collapse of industrial civilisation.
sentences.chinese: 如果我对你的理解正确的话，你在主张不做任何事情去防止可能的工业文明的崩溃。

sentences.english: Let us examine our history and see how men - the master race for all of our recorded history in almost every corner of every human civilisation - have fared so far.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，让我们检查一下我们的历史，并且看看男性——在我们所有现存历史，几乎每一个人类文明的角落都是统治者的族群，是如何发展的。

name: renaissance
trans: n. 文艺复兴（欧洲14至17世纪）

sentences.chinese: …伦敦美术馆里文艺复兴时期的杰作。

detailed_translations.english: a new interest in something, especially a particular form of art, music etc, that has not been popular for a long period

name: epic
trans: n. 史诗；叙事诗；史诗般的作品 adj. 史诗的，叙事诗的

sentences.english: an epic tale of mutiny on the high seas
sentences.chinese: 关于公海哗变的惊心动魄的故事

sentences.english: epic poetry
sentences.chinese: 史诗

detailed_translations.english: an epic book, poem, or film tells a long story about brave actions and exciting events

name: ideology
trans: n. 意识形态；思想意识；观念学

sentences.english: the ideologies of fascism and terrorism
sentences.chinese: 法西斯主义和恐怖主义的意识形态

sentences.english: a new ideology based on individualism
sentences.chinese: 基于个人主义的新思想体系

sentences.chinese: 根据传统习俗，婚礼的费用由新娘的父母承担。

sentences.chinese: 科幻小说迷的集会

sentences.english: She was stopped at customs and questioned.
sentences.chinese: 她在海关被叫住接受问话。

sentences.english: It took ages to clear customs (= be allowed through customs ) but then we were out of the airport quite quickly.
sentences.chinese: 过海关花了很长时间，不过出机场倒是很快。

sentences.english: You won’t be able to take that through customs.
sentences.chinese: 你带着那东西过不了海关的。

sentences.chinese: 随着西方封建制度解体，商业阶层应运而生。

detailed_translations.english: a system which existed in the Middle Ages, in which people received land and protection from a lord when they worked and fought for him

name: slavery
trans: n. 奴役；奴隶制度；奴隶身份

sentences.chinese: 废除奴隶制的努力

detailed_translations.english: the system of having slaves

name: ethical
trans: n. 处方药 adj. 伦理的；道德的；凭处方出售的

sentences.english: The president must have the highest ethical standards.
sentences.chinese: 总统必须具备最高的道德水准。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伦理的；道德的；凭处方出售的
detailed_translations.english: relating to principles of what is right and wrong

trans: adj. 道德的；精神上的；品性端正的 n. 道德；寓意

sentences.english: It is easy to have an opinion on a moral issue like the death penalty for murder.
sentences.chinese: 对于判谋杀犯死刑这种涉及伦理道德的问题，有个观点并非难事。

sentences.english: If we accept that certain babies should be allowed to die, we place doctors in a moral dilemma .
sentences.chinese: 如果我们同意应该允许某些婴儿死去，那就是让医生在道德上处于两难境地了。

sentences.english: Man is gifted with a moral sense by which he distinguishes good from evil.
sentences.chinese: 人类天生有道德意识，能区分善与恶。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the principles of what is right and wrong behaviour, and with the difference between good and evil

detailed_translations.chinese: 品行， 道德规范； 寓意

trans: n. 部落；族；宗族；一伙

sentences.chinese: 一个叫“海豚族”的澳大利亚土著部落

trans: n. 土著居民；土生生物 adj. 土著的；原始的

sentences.chinese: …土著艺术。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the Australian aborigines
an aborigine

sentences.chinese: 新加坡有很多土生的棕榈树种。

sentences.english: You can always tell the difference between the tourists and the natives.
sentences.chinese: 游客与当地人之间的区别一望即知。

trans: n. 人类学家；人类学者

sentences.english: This is something I learned as an anthropologist –people love to tell their stories.
sentences.chinese: 这是我作为一名人类学家所理解的----人们喜欢讲述自己的故事。

sentences.english: Fisher, a biological anthropologist, says she wrote her latest book because she wanted to uncover the science behind “why you love who you love and perhaps even help people find the one”.
sentences.chinese: 费舍尔，生物人类学家，说她的最新著作的出发点是缘于她想揭开“为什么你会爱上你的爱人，这也许会帮助人们找到爱人”背后的科学依据。

sentences.english: A data manager, media coordinator, and medical anthropologist will also be arriving over the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 一名数据管理员、媒体协调员和医学人类学家也将于周末抵达。

sentences.english: And on each of those issues we have said that we would consider that and, in fact, have provided some humanitarian support.
sentences.chinese: 对于每一件这样的事情，我们都说过，我们将会对此进行考虑，事实上，我们向他们提供了人道主义援助。

sentences.english: But part of trying to do what is right for the Burmese people is to provide humanitarian assistance in this time of extreme need.
sentences.chinese: 但是，对缅甸人民来说，正确的行动部分是为他们提供人道主义援助，而在目前这个时刻更是极端的需要”。

sentences.english: But otherwise, it is best left to the humanitarian experts, who will be there after you are gone and therefore need to preserve their independence and their impartiality.
sentences.chinese: 但是，如果不能，最好将这些任务留给人道主义专家，这些专家在部队撤退之后仍将留在那，因此需要保持他们的独立和公正。

name: heritage

sentences.english: beautiful old buildings which are part of our heritage
sentences.chinese: 属于我们遗产一部分的漂亮古建筑

sentences.chinese: 古董红木书桌

sentences.chinese: 他专修考古学。

sentences.english: In my recent research, I found that all three come together and, what is more, they help me to show that archaeology has relevance – it is not just old stones and bones.
sentences.chinese: 我在最近的研究中发现，这三点综合发生着作用，除此之外，它们也帮助我发现考古学的重要意义，它不仅仅意味着一堆石头和骨头。

sentences.english: "There was no access to clean water, there was no access to basic education especially in the rural areas where the archaeology was," she says.
sentences.chinese: 在那里的考古学特别是农村地区，我们并没有获得干净的水，有没有基本的教育的机会，“她说。

sentences.chinese: 美洲印第安人的陶器

sentences.chinese: 由女主人来完成点燃两根蜡烛的神圣仪式。

sentences.chinese: 如果有什么事情没做好，就会动摇你对自己的信心。

sentences.chinese: 灵魂的不灭

sentences.chinese: 仿佛那双灰眼睛能看到她的灵魂深处。

sentences.chinese: 他情绪非常低落，连电话也不愿接。

sentences.chinese: 圣城瓦拉纳西

sentences.chinese: 他接受培训成了一名天主教神父。

sentences.chinese: 一家《圣经》册本和圣歌集出版商

sentences.english: a short church service
sentences.chinese: 简短的教堂礼拜仪式

sentences.english: church bells

detailed_translations.chinese: 领…到教堂接受宗教仪式

name: cathedral

sentences.english: This Gothic cathedral has attracted visitors from all around the world .
sentences.chinese: 这座哥特式的大教堂吸引了世界各地的游客。

sentences.english: Rosie gray is the one and only person , if it had not been for her , this crystal cathedral would not be here.
sentences.chinese: 她就是那一位，唯一的一人若没有她，水晶宫大教堂不会存在，这事工永远不会展开。
