to do sports or other physical activities in order to stay healthy or become stronger; to make an animal do this

name: indoor
trans: adj. 室内的，户内的

sentences.english: an indoor swimming pool
sentences.chinese: 室内游泳池

sentences.english: the world indoor athletics championship
sentences.chinese: 世界室内田径锦标赛

sentences.english: Too much central heating can harm indoor plants.
sentences.chinese: 中央供暖系统温度太高对室内植物有害。

detailed_translations.english: used or happening inside a building

name: outdoor
trans: adj. 户外的；露天的；野外的（等于out-of-door）

sentences.english: a huge outdoor market
sentences.chinese: 一个规模庞大的露天市场

sentences.english: outdoor recreational activities
sentences.chinese: 户外娱乐活动

sentences.english: outdoor clothing
sentences.chinese: 户外装

sentences.english: a healthy outdoor life
sentences.chinese: 有益健康的户外生活

detailed_translations.english: existing, happening, or used outside, not inside a building

name: motion
trans: n. 动作；移动；手势；请求；意向；议案 vi. 运动；打手势 vt. 运动；向…打手势

sentences.english: She motioned for the locked front doors to be opened.
sentences.chinese: 她打手势示意把锁着的前门打开。

sentences.english: He stood aside and motioned Don to the door.
sentences.chinese: 他站在一边，示意唐到门口。

detailed_translations.english: If you motion to someone, you move your hand or head as a way of telling them to do something or telling them where to go

detailed_translations.chinese: 运动；手势，眼色，动作；提议
detailed_translations.english: the process of moving or the way that someone or something moves

name: mobile
trans: adj. 可移动的；机动的；易变的；非固定的 n. 运动物体

sentences.english: mobile air-conditioners
sentences.chinese: 移动式空调器

sentences.english: a mobile shop/library (= one inside a vehicle)
sentences.chinese: 流动商店 / 图书馆

detailed_translations.english: that is not fixed in one place and can be moved easily and quickly

name: movement
trans: n. 运动；活动；运转；乐章

sentences.english: the dancer’s graceful movements
sentences.chinese: 舞蹈演员优美的动作

sentences.english: reports of troop movements in the area
sentences.chinese: 该地区部队动向的报告

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something changes position or moves from one place to another

name: yoga
trans: n. 瑜珈（意为“结合”，指修行）；瑜珈术 n. 联想可360°翻转的超轻薄笔记本电脑

sentences.english: I do yoga twice a week.
sentences.chinese: 我一周做两次瑜伽。

detailed_translations.chinese: 瑜珈（意为“结合”，指修行）；瑜珈术
detailed_translations.english: a system of exercises that help you control your mind and body in order to relax

name: sprawl
trans: n. 蔓生；伸开手足躺卧姿势 vt. 懒散地伸开；使蔓生 vi. 蔓延；伸开手足躺；无计划地扩展

sentences.english: He sprawled out on the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 他摊开手脚躺在沙发上。

sentences.english: I tripped on a stone and went sprawling on the pavement.
sentences.chinese: 我被一块石头绊了一下，四仰八叉地摔在人行道上。

sentences.english: a blow which sent him sprawling
sentences.chinese: 打得他四脚朝天的一拳

detailed_translations.chinese: 蔓延；伸开手足躺；无计划地扩展
detailed_translations.english: to lie or sit with your arms or legs stretched out in a lazy or careless way

detailed_translations.chinese: 蔓生；伸开手足躺卧姿势

name: stretch
trans: vt. 伸展

sentences.english: Carl sat up in bed, yawned, and stretched.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔从床上坐起来，打了个呵欠，伸了伸懒 腰。

sentences.english: Always stretch before exercising.
sentences.chinese: 锻炼之前都要做伸展运动。

detailed_translations.english: to straighten your arms, legs, or body to full length
to reach a long way for something

detailed_translations.chinese: 一段时间； 一段距离；延伸， 连绵； 连绵的一片
detailed_translations.english: a continuous period of time

name: strain
trans: n. 张力；拉紧；负担；扭伤；血缘 vt. 拉紧；滥用；滤去；竭力 vi. 拉紧；尽力 n. （植物、动物的）品种；种类

sentences.english: I’ve strained a muscle in my leg.
sentences.chinese: 我的腿有一处肌肉拉伤。

sentences.english: You’ll strain your eyes trying to read in this light.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的光线下看书会伤眼睛的。

detailed_translations.english: to injure a muscle or part of your body by using it too much or making it work too hard
to try very hard to do something using all your strength or ability

name: chess
trans: n. 国际象棋，西洋棋

sentences.english: They meet fairly often to play chess .
sentences.chinese: 他们经常在一起下国际象棋。

detailed_translations.english: a game for two players, who move their playing pieces according to particular rules across a special board to try to trap their opponent’s king

name: badminton
trans: n. 羽毛球

sentences.english: Can I try you new badminton racket?
sentences.chinese: 我可以试用你的羽毛球拍吗？

sentences.english: I like playing basketball and  badminton.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢的篮球和羽毛球。

sentences.english: My friend and I take part in sports like tennis,badminton and swimming.
sentences.chinese: 我和我的朋友参加体育运动如打网球,羽毛球和游泳.

detailed_translations.english: a game that is similar to tennis but played with a  shuttlecock (=  small feathered object  )  instead of a ball

name: golf
trans: n. 高尔夫球；高尔夫球运动 vi. 打高尔夫球

sentences.english: He plays golf on Sundays.
sentences.chinese: 他星期天都去打高尔夫球。

sentences.english: a round of golf
sentences.chinese: 一场高尔夫球赛

detailed_translations.chinese: 高尔夫球；高尔夫球运动
detailed_translations.english: a game in which the players hit a small white ball into holes in the ground with a set of golf clubs, using as few hits as possible

name: billiards
trans: n. 台球，桌球；弹子戏

detailed_translations.english: a game played on a cloth-covered table in which balls are hit with a  cue (=  a long stick  )  against each other and into pockets at the edge of the table

name: soccer
trans: n. 英式足球，足球

sentences.english: I never play soccer.
sentences.chinese: 我从来不踢足球。

sentences.english: France and Spain will meet in the soccer cup final.
sentences.chinese: 法国队和西班牙队将在足球锦标赛决赛中交锋。

sentences.english: It must be one of those soccer scarfs from England.
sentences.chinese: 那一定是某个英国足球队的围巾。

detailed_translations.english: a sport played by two teams of 11 players, who try to kick a round ball into their opponents’  goal

name: tennis
trans: n. 网球（运动）

sentences.english: She excels all of us at tennis.
sentences.chinese: 她的网球比我们打得都好。

sentences.english: I like his smile and his tennis!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢他的微笑和他的网球！

sentences.english: If she decides to go with her sister instead, then I can play tennis with you.
sentences.chinese: 要是她决定和她姐姐一起出去，那我就能和你去打网球。

detailed_translations.english: a game for two people or two pairs of people who use  rackets  to hit a small soft ball backwards and forwards over a net

name: volleyball
trans: n. 排球

sentences.english: I like playing beach volleyball.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢打沙滩排球。

sentences.english: Every sunday, they played volleyball in the park.
sentences.chinese: 每个周日他们在公园打排球。

sentences.english: Balloon, baseball, basketball, football and volleyball all dance  ballet on the  volcano.
sentences.chinese: 气球、棒球、篮球、足球和排球都在火山上跳芭蕾舞。

detailed_translations.english: a game in which two teams use their hands to hit a ball over a high net

name: hockey
trans: n. 曲棍球；冰球

sentences.english: ...a new hockey arena.
sentences.chinese: …一个新的冰球场。

detailed_translations.english: a game played on grass by two teams of 11 players, with sticks and a ball

name: cricket
trans: n. 板球，板球运动；蟋蟀

sentences.english: The boy traded his knife for a cricket bat.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩用他的刀子换了一个板球棒。

sentences.english: He angrily stomped his cricket after failing the fight.
sentences.chinese: 比赛失败后，他生气地踏死了他的蟋蟀。

sentences.english: He was pressganged into playing in the charity cricket match.
sentences.chinese: 他是被强拉去参加这场板球义赛的。

detailed_translations.english: a game between two teams of 11 players in which players try to get points by hitting a ball and running between two sets of three sticks

name: goal
trans: n. 目标；球门，得分数；终点 vi. 攻门，射门得分

sentences.english: Your goal as a parent is to help your child become an independent adult.
sentences.chinese: 身为父母，你的目标就是要培养孩子成为独立的成年人。

sentences.english: be in goal/keep goal (=be the goalkeeper)
sentences.chinese: 守球门

sentences.english: I scored the first goal.
sentences.chinese: 我踢进了第一个球。

detailed_translations.english: something that you hope to achieve in the future

name: bat
trans: n. 蝙蝠；球棒；球拍；批处理文件的扩展名 vt. 用球棒击球；击球率达… vi. 轮到击球；用球棒击球

sentences.english: A bat echolocates the direction.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠凭回声测定方向。

sentences.english: Having been suggested by a bat, people invented sonar.
sentences.chinese: 受到蝙蝠的启发，人们发明了声呐。

sentences.english: It is technically incorrect to talk about bat ‘radar’, since they do not use radio waves.
sentences.chinese: 严密来说，说蝙蝠有“雷达”系统是错误的，因为他们并不使用无线电波。

detailed_translations.english: a small animal like a mouse with wings that flies around at night

name: racket
trans: n. 球拍；吵闹，喧闹 vt. 过着花天酒地的生活 vi. 过着花天酒地的生活

sentences.english: The old machine used to make an awful racket .
sentences.chinese: 这台旧机器以前噪音大得吓人。

detailed_translations.english: a loud noise

name: kick
trans: vt. 踢；反冲，朝后座 n. 踢；反冲，后座力 vi. 踢；反冲

sentences.english: He kicked the door hard.
sentences.chinese: 他用力踢门。

sentences.english: The boys were kicking a ball around in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在院子里踢球。

sentences.english: She gave him a kick on the shin.
sentences.chinese: 她朝他的小腿踢了一脚。

detailed_translations.english: to hit sb/sth with your foot
a movement with the foot or the leg, usually to hit sth with the foot

name: knock
trans: vi. 敲；打；敲击 vt. 敲；打；敲击；批评 n. 敲；敲打；爆震声

sentences.english: I knocked and knocked but nobody answered.
sentences.chinese: 我把门敲了又敲，但无人回应。

sentences.english: He got a nasty knock on the head.
sentences.chinese: 他头部遭到重重一击。

detailed_translations.english: to hit a door or window with your closed hand to attract the attention of the people inside
a sharp blow from sth hard

name: flip
trans: n. 弹；筋斗 vi. 用指轻弹；蹦跳 adj. 无礼的；轻率的 vt. 掷；轻击

sentences.english: I was fed up with his flip comments.
sentences.chinese: 我听够了他那些轻率的评论。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〈口〉无理的， 轻率的， 轻浮的
detailed_translations.english: not said or meant seriously
to move something with a quick sudden movement so that it is in a different position
an action in which you make a flat object such as a coin go upwards and turn over in the air

name: pitch
trans: n. 沥青；音高；程度；树脂；倾斜；投掷；球场 vt. 投；掷；定位于；用沥青涂；扎营；向前倾跌 vi. 倾斜；投掷；搭帐篷；坠落

sentences.english: She crumpled up the page and pitched it into the fire.
sentences.chinese: 她把那页纸揉成团，扔进了火里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 投掷， 扔； 猛然倒下； (船、 飞机)颠簸
detailed_translations.english: to fall or be moved suddenly in a particular direction, or to make someone or something do this

detailed_translations.chinese: 球场；程度，强度；高度，高音；沥青；顶点
detailed_translations.english: a marked out area of ground on which a sport is played

detailed_translations.chinese: 销售；投掷，扔；使猛然倒下；表达；把…定于特定程度；定调；架设，搭，营
detailed_translations.english: to fall or be moved suddenly in a particular direction, or to make someone or something do this

name: throw
trans: n. 投掷；冒险 vt. 投；抛；掷 vi. 抛；投掷

sentences.english: The bus stopped suddenly and we were all thrown forwards.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车猛地停住，我们都往前栽。

detailed_translations.chinese: [threw-thrown] 投， 扔， 抛； 使突然陷入； 使困惑， 使吃惊
detailed_translations.english: to make an object such as a ball move quickly through the air by pushing your hand forward quickly and letting the object go

name: toss
trans: n. 投掷；摇荡；投掷的距离；掷币赌胜负 vt. 投掷；使…不安；突然抬起；使…上下摇动；与…掷币打赌 vi. 辗转；被乱扔；颠簸；掷钱币决定某事

sentences.english: I’ve been tossing and turning all night.
sentences.chinese: 我一晚上辗转反侧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 掷钱币来决定；翻来覆去
detailed_translations.english: to keep changing your position in bed because you cannot sleep

detailed_translations.chinese: 扔，抛，掷；猛抬；拌；掷；使摇动，使颠簸
detailed_translations.english: to throw something, especially something light, with a quick gentle movement of your hand

detailed_translations.chinese: 掷钱币来决定； 猛抬头
detailed_translations.english: the act of throwing a coin in the air to decide something, especially who will do something first in a game

name: slide
trans: n. 滑动；幻灯片；滑梯；雪崩 vt. 滑动；使滑动；悄悄地迅速放置 vi. 滑动；滑落；不知不觉陷入

sentences.english: He slid open the door of the glass cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 他滑开玻璃柜的门。

detailed_translations.english: to move smoothly over a surface while continuing to touch it, or to make something move in this way
to move smoothly over a surface while continuing to touch it, or to make something move in this way
a large structure with steps leading to the top of a long sloping surface which children can slide down

name: slip
trans: n. 滑，滑倒；片，纸片；错误；下跌；事故 abbr. 串行线路接口协议，是旧式的协议（Serial Line Interface Protocol） adj. 滑动的；有活结的；活络的 vt. 使滑动；滑过；摆脱；塞入；闪开 vi. 滑动；滑倒；犯错；失足；减退

sentences.english: Ben slipped quietly out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 本悄悄地溜出了房间。

sentences.english: One man managed to slip from the club as police arrived.
sentences.chinese: 警察到来时，一个男子设法溜出了俱乐部。

sentences.english: We must be well prepared, there must be no slips.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须好好准备，一定不要有差错。

detailed_translations.chinese: 滑跤，滑落，溜；下降，跌落；悄悄放进
detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere, without attracting other people’s attention
A slip is a small or unimportant mistake

name: glide
trans: vi. 滑翔；滑行；悄悄地走；消逝 vt. 使滑行；使滑动 n. 滑翔；滑行；滑移；滑音

sentences.english: Waiters glide between tightly packed tables bearing trays of pasta.
sentences.chinese: 侍者们托着一盘盘的意大利面食在拥挤的餐桌间自如穿行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 滑翔；滑行；悄悄地走；消逝
detailed_translations.english: to move smoothly and quietly, as if without effort
a smooth quiet movement that seems to take no effort

name: tumble
trans: n. 跌倒；翻筋斗；跌跤 vt. 使摔倒；使滚翻；弄乱 vi. 摔倒；倒塌；滚动；打滚；仓惶地行动 [ 过去式tumbled 过去分词tumbled 现在分词tumbling ]

sentences.english: Oil prices have tumbled.
sentences.chinese: 石油价格猛跌。

detailed_translations.chinese: 跌倒，摔下，滚下；翻滚；暴跌；不由自主地卷入
detailed_translations.english: to fall down quickly and suddenly, especially with a rolling movement
a fall, especially from a high place or level

name: ski
trans: n. 滑雪橇 vi. 滑雪 adj. 滑雪（用）的

sentences.english: ski slopes
sentences.chinese: 滑雪坡

sentences.english: a ski resort (= where people can go skiing )
sentences.chinese: 滑雪度假胜地

sentences.english: ...the Swiss ski resort of Klosters.
sentences.chinese: …瑞士的克洛斯特斯滑雪胜地。

sentences.english: ...a private ski instructor.
sentences.chinese: …一位私人滑雪教练。

detailed_translations.english: one of a pair of long thin narrow pieces of wood or plastic that you fasten to your boots and use for moving on snow or on water
to move on skis for sport or in order to travel on snow or water
You use ski to refer to things that are concerned with skiing

name: skate
trans: n. 溜冰；冰鞋 vi. 滑冰；滑过

sentences.english: The children skated on the frozen pond.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在结冰的池塘上滑冰。

detailed_translations.english: to move on skates
one of a pair of boots with metal blades on the bottom, for moving quickly on ice

name: cycling
trans: n. 骑脚踏车消遣；骑脚踏车兜风

sentences.english: But the traffic worries me! I’m not sure about cycling in such heavy traffic.
sentences.chinese: 但是交通使我担心！ 在这么拥挤的车辆中骑自行车我不太肯定。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of riding a bicycle

name: dive
trans: n. 潜水；跳水；俯冲；扑 vi. 潜水；跳水；俯冲；急剧下降

sentences.english: Diving off the cliffs is dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 从悬崖上跳水是很危险的。

sentences.english: The first time you dive on a coral reef is an experience you will never forget.
sentences.chinese: 第一次在珊瑚礁潜水是毕生难忘的经历。

sentences.english: The submarine began to dive.
sentences.chinese: 潜水艇开始下潜。

sentences.english: Thankfully, the pilot managed to pull out of the dive and regain control.
sentences.chinese: 幸亏驾驶员设法将俯冲的飞机拉起，恢复了对飞机的控制。

detailed_translations.english: to jump into deep water with your head and arms going in first

detailed_translations.chinese: 跳水（的动作）；潜水（的动作）；俯冲
detailed_translations.english: a jump into deep water with your head and arms going in first

name: drift
trans: n. 漂流，漂移；趋势；漂流物 vi. 漂流，漂移；漂泊 vt. 使…漂流；使…受风吹积

sentences.english: Smoke drifted up from the jungle ahead of us.
sentences.chinese: 我们前方的丛林里有烟升起。

sentences.english: Jenni spent the year drifting around Europe.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮这一年来一直在欧洲各地漂泊。

sentences.english: a drift towards longer working hours
sentences.chinese: 工作时间不知不觉的变长

sentences.english: the drift from the countryside to the cities
sentences.chinese: 大量人口从乡村往城市的流动

detailed_translations.english: to move slowly on water or in the air
a slow change or development from one situation, opinion etc to another

name: jump
trans: n. 跳跃；暴涨；惊跳 vt. 跳跃；使跳跃；跳过；突升 vi. 跳跃；暴涨；猛增

sentences.english: The cats jumped down and came to meet us.
sentences.chinese: 这些猫跳下来，过来迎接我们。

detailed_translations.english: to let yourself drop from a place that is above the ground
to let yourself drop from a place that is above the ground

name: leap
trans: vi. 跳，跳跃 n. 飞跃；跳跃 vt. 跳跃，跳过；使跃过

sentences.english: She leapt over the fence.
sentences.chinese: 她跳过篱笆。

sentences.english: He threw a stick into the river and the dog went after it in a flying leap.
sentences.chinese: 他把一根枝条扔到河里，那条狗一个飞跃就追了过去。

detailed_translations.english: to jump high into the air or to jump in order to land in a different place
a big jump

name: plunge
trans: n. 投入；跳进 vt. 使陷入；使投入；使插入 vi. 突然地下降；投入；陷入；跳进

sentences.english: The government's political and economic reforms threaten to plunge the country into chaos.
sentences.chinese: 该政府的政治和经济改革有可能使这个国家陷入混乱之中。

sentences.english: Eddy found himself plunged into a world of brutal violence.
sentences.chinese: 埃迪发现自己突然陷入了一个残酷暴力的世界。

detailed_translations.english: to make sb/sth experience sth unpleasant

name: spring
trans: n. 春天；弹簧；泉水；活力；跳跃 adj. 春天的 vt. 使跳起；使爆炸；突然提出；使弹开 vi. 生长；涌出；跃出；裂开

sentences.english: He sprang to his feet (= stood up suddenly ) and rushed after her.
sentences.chinese: 他腾地站起身，冲过去追她。

sentences.english: There are several hot springs in the area.
sentences.chinese: 这地区有几处温泉。

sentences.english: With a spring, the cat leapt on to the table.
sentences.chinese: 猫一跃跳上桌子。

detailed_translations.english: to move suddenly and quickly in a particular direction, especially by jumping
a place where water comes up naturally from the ground

name: hop
trans: vt. 搭乘 v. 单足跳跃〔跳行〕 vi. 双足或齐足跳行 n. 蹦跳

sentences.english: a little girl hopping and skipping
sentences.chinese: 一个蹦蹦跳跳的小女孩

detailed_translations.chinese: 单足跳跃，单足跳行；齐足跳跃，齐足跳行
detailed_translations.english: to move by jumping on one foot
to move by jumping on one foot
a short jump

name: bounce
trans: n. 跳；弹力；活力 vt. 弹跳；使弹起 vi. 弹跳；弹起，反跳；弹回

sentences.english: Stop bouncing up and down on the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 别在沙发上蹦来蹦去了。

detailed_translations.english: if a ball or other object bounces, or you bounce it, it immediately moves up or away from a surface after hitting it
the action of moving up and down on a surface

name: tent
trans: n. 帐篷；住处；帷幕 vt. 用帐篷遮盖；使在帐篷里住宿 vi. 住帐蓬；暂时居住

sentences.english: We looked for a flat spot where we could pitch our tent (= put up our tent ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们寻找一个平缓的地方搭帐篷。

detailed_translations.english: a shelter consisting of a sheet of cloth supported by poles and ropes, used especially for camping

detailed_translations.chinese: 用帐篷遮盖；使在帐篷里住宿

name: camp
trans: n. 露营 vt. 扎营；使扎营 vi. 露营；扎营

sentences.english: Let’s go back to camp – it’s getting dark.
sentences.chinese: 我们回营地吧，天快黑了。

sentences.english: a camp near Lake Ellen Wilson
sentences.chinese: 埃伦•威尔逊湖边的营地

sentences.english: The soldiers broke camp (= took down their tents etc ) and left before dawn.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们在黎明前拔营出发了。

sentences.english: We set up camp (= made the camping place ready ) at nearby Icicle Lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们在附近的冰柱湖边建了营地。

sentences.english: The expedition’s base camp (= main camp ) was 6,000 feet below the summit.
sentences.chinese: 探险队的大本营在山峰下面6,000英尺处。

detailed_translations.english: a place where people stay in tents, shelters etc for a short time, usually in the mountains, a forest etc
to set up a tent or shelter and stay there for a short time

name: picnic
trans: n. 野餐 vi. 去野餐

sentences.english: We decided to have a picnic down by the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定在湖边野餐。

sentences.english: a picnic table
sentences.chinese: 野餐桌

sentences.english: There is free parking for visitors, as well as a restaurant and picnic area (= a special area with tables where people can have a picnic ) .
sentences.chinese: 除了餐厅和野餐区，我们还为游客提供免费停车位。

sentences.english: The area is very popular with picnickers.
sentences.chinese: 那个地区很受野餐者的欢迎。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a picnic, you take food and eat it outdoors, especially in the country
to have a picnic

name: hunt
trans: n. 狩猎；搜寻 vt. 打猎；搜索 vi. 打猎；搜寻

sentences.english: lion/rhino/stag etc hunt
sentences.chinese: 猎狮/犀牛/雄鹿等

sentences.english: the hunt for the missing child
sentences.chinese: 搜寻失踪儿童

sentences.english: Wolves tend to hunt in packs (= hunt in groups ) .
sentences.chinese: 狼往往成群捕猎。

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when people chase animals in order to kill or catch them
to chase animals and birds in order to kill or catch them

name: race
trans: n. 属，种；种族，人种；家庭，门第 vt. 使参加比赛；和…竞赛；使急走，使全速行进 vi. 比速度，参加竞赛；全速行进

sentences.english: The race is on to develop more environmentally friendly forms of energy.
sentences.chinese: 人们正在竞相开发更环保的能源形式。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which one group of people tries to obtain or achieve something before another group does

name: marathon
trans: n. 马拉松赛跑；耐力的考验 adj. 马拉松式的；有耐力的 vi. 参加马拉松赛跑

sentences.english: the Boston Marathon
sentences.chinese: 波士顿马拉松赛

sentences.english: Garcia ran the marathon in just under three hours.
sentences.chinese: 加西亚用了不到三小时就跑完了马拉松。

detailed_translations.chinese: 马拉松赛跑；耐力的考验
detailed_translations.english: a long race of about 26 miles or 42 kilometres
a marathon event continues for a long time and needs a lot of energy, patience, or determination

name: pedestrian
trans: n. 行人；步行者 adj. 徒步的；缺乏想像力的

sentences.english: More than a third of all pedestrian injuries are to children.
sentences.chinese: 所有受伤的行人中有1/3以上是儿童。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is walking, especially along a street or other place used by cars

name: pace
trans: n. 一步；步速；步伐；速度 vi. 踱步；缓慢而行 vt. 踱步于；用步测

sentences.english: He quickened his pace , longing to be home.
sentences.chinese: 他加快步伐，盼望着早点回到家中。

sentences.english: Traffic slowed to a walking pace.
sentences.chinese: 车流速度减缓，犹如步行。

sentences.english: I found Mark at the hospital, pacing restlessly up and down.
sentences.chinese: 我看见马克在医院里焦躁不安地踱来踱去。

detailed_translations.english: the speed at which someone walks, runs, or moves
to walk first in one direction and then in another many times, especially because you are nervous

name: step
trans: n. 步，脚步；步骤；步伐；梯级 vt. 走，迈步 vi. 踏，踩；走

sentences.english: a video of baby’s first steps
sentences.chinese: 一盒婴儿学步的录像带

sentences.english: He took one step and fell.
sentences.chinese: 他走了一步就跌倒了。

sentences.english: I had to retrace my steps (= go back the way I came ) several times before I found the shop.
sentences.chinese: 我来回走了几次才找到那家商店。

sentences.english: This is the first step in reforming the welfare system.
sentences.chinese: 这是福利制度改革的第一步。

sentences.english: Jenny sat on the step in front of the house, waiting.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮坐在房前的台阶上等着。

sentences.english: I accidentally stepped in a puddle.
sentences.chinese: 我不小心踩进了水坑。

detailed_translations.english: the movement you make when you put one foot in front of or behind the other when walking
to bring your foot down on something

name: excursion
trans: n. 偏移；远足；短程旅行；离题；游览，游览团

sentences.english: They've gone on an excursion to York.
sentences.chinese: 他们到约克旅游去了。

detailed_translations.english: a short journey made for pleasure, especially one that has been organized for a group of people

name: cruise
trans: n. 巡航，巡游；乘船游览 vt. 巡航，巡游；漫游 vi. 巡航，巡游；漫游

sentences.english: We were cruising along at 50 miles per hour.
sentences.chinese: 我们以每小时50英里的速度平稳行驶。

sentences.english: We fly at a cruising speed of 500 mph.
sentences.chinese: 我们以每小时500英里的巡航速度平稳飞行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 巡航；以节省燃料的速度前进
detailed_translations.english: to move at a steady speed in a car, aircraft etc
a holiday on a large ship

name: trip
trans: n. 旅行；绊倒；差错 vt. 绊倒；使犯错 vi. 绊倒；远足；犯错误；轻快地走

sentences.english: Two lucky employees won a round-the-world trip.
sentences.chinese: 两名幸运的雇员赢得一次环游世界的机会。

sentences.english: It’s an 80-mile round trip (= a journey to a place and back again ) to Exeter.
sentences.chinese: 到埃克塞特往返有80英里。

sentences.english: I’m afraid you’ve had a wasted trip (= a trip in which you do not achieve your purpose ) . Mr Burgess has already left.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕你是白来一趟了，伯吉斯先生已经走了。

sentences.english: He was unable to make the trip to accept the award.
sentences.chinese: 他无法前去领奖。

detailed_translations.english: a visit to a place that involves a journey, for pleasure or a particular purpose
to hit something with your foot by accident so that you fall or almost fall

name: vacation
trans: n. 假期；（房屋）搬出 vi. 休假，度假

sentences.english: What will you do this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 你这个假期将干什么？

sentences.english: Do you have any vacation plans?
sentences.chinese: 您假期有什么安排吗？

sentences.english: Do you have any idea for this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 这个假期你有什么想法吗？

detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere for a holiday
a holiday, or time spent not working

name: hike
trans: n. 远足；徒步旅行；涨价 vt. 提高；拉起；使…高涨 vi. 远足；徒步旅行；上升

sentences.english: He wants to hike round the world.
sentences.chinese: 他打算徒步旅行环游世界一周。

sentences.english: You can organize a picnic in the park, a group hike or bike ride, or meet up with friends for one of those free local events.
sentences.chinese: 你可以组织在公园野餐一群徒步旅行或者骑自行车或者和朋友会面为其中的一个免费本地事件。

detailed_translations.english: to take a long walk in the mountains or countryside
a long walk in the mountains or countryside
to increase a price, tax etc by a large amount

name: jog
trans: vt. 慢跑；轻推；蹒跚行进；使颠簸 vi. 慢跑；轻推；蹒跚行进；颠簸着移动 n. 慢跑；轻推，轻撞

sentences.english: I go jogging every morning.
sentences.chinese: 我每天早晨都去慢跑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 慢跑；轻推；蹒跚行进；使颠簸
detailed_translations.english: to run slowly and steadily, especially as a way of exercising
a slow steady run, especially done as a way of exercising

name: stride
trans: n. 大步；步幅；进展 vt. 跨过；大踏步走过；跨坐在… vi. 跨；跨过；大步行走

sentences.english: He strode toward her.
sentences.chinese: 他大步向她走去。

sentences.english: Paco reached the door in only three strides.
sentences.chinese: 帕科三大步就走到了门口。

detailed_translations.english: to walk quickly with long steps
a long step you make while you are walking

name: wander
trans: vi. 徘徊；漫步；迷路；离题 vt. 游荡，漫游

sentences.english: She wandered aimlessly around the streets.
sentences.chinese: 她在大街上漫无目的地到处游荡。

sentences.english: Pauline started to wander from the point.
sentences.chinese: 保利娜开始偏题了。

sentences.english: Don’t let any of the kids wander off.
sentences.chinese: 不要让任何一个小孩走开去。

detailed_translations.english: to walk slowly across or around an area, usually without a clear direction or purpose

name: linger
trans: vi. 徘徊；苟延残喘；磨蹭 vt. 消磨；缓慢度过

sentences.english: He surprised all the doctors by lingering on for several weeks.
sentences.chinese: 他拖了几个星期才去世，让所有的医生都很惊讶。

detailed_translations.english: to continue looking at or dealing with something for longer than is usual or desirable

name: lag
trans: n. 落后；迟延；防护套；囚犯；桶板 vt. 落后于；押往监狱；加上外套 vi. 滞后；缓缓而行；蹒跚 adj. 最后的

sentences.english: In this scenario, due to the lag time required to assimilate new resources, the relationship between required resources and estimated delivery timeframe may even turn negative.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，由于时间已经落后，需要吸收新的人力资源，需要的资源和预计的交付时间的关系甚至更加复杂。

sentences.english: But to many, at least as far as science is concerned, it is the countries that were doing well that are now doing better, whereas those at the bottom continue to lag significantly behind.
sentences.chinese: 但是对于许多人而言，至少在科学方面，正是那些在过去做的很好的国家现在正在做的更好，而那些位于底层的国家的科学继续落后。

sentences.english: One is that some countries still lag behind.
sentences.chinese: 一个原因是一些国家仍很落后。

name: climb
trans: n. 爬；攀登 vi. 爬；攀登；上升 vt. 爬；攀登；上升

sentences.english: Harry climbed the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 哈里爬上楼梯。

sentences.english: Boys were climbing trees along the river bank.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在河边爬树。

detailed_translations.english: to move up, down, or across something using your feet and hands, especially when this is difficult to do
to move up, down, or across something using your feet and hands, especially when this is difficult to do

name: pull
trans: n. 拉，拉绳；拉力，牵引力；拖 vt. 拉；拔；拖 vi. 拉，拖；拔

sentences.english: Mom! Davey’s pulling my hair!
sentences.chinese: 妈妈! 戴维拽我的头发！

sentences.english: He gave her a sharp pull forward.
sentences.chinese: 他猛地把她往前一拉。

detailed_translations.english: to use your hands to make something or someone move towards you or in the direction that your hands are moving
an act of using force to move something towards you or in the same direction that you are moving

name: drag
trans: n. 拖；拖累 vi. 拖曳；缓慢而吃力地行进 vt. 拖累；拖拉；缓慢而吃力地行进

sentences.english: He grabbed her arm and dragged her into the room.
sentences.chinese: 他抓住她的手臂把她拖进房间。

sentences.english: He took a drag on his cigarette, and exhaled the smoke.
sentences.chinese: 他咂了口烟，然后吐出烟雾。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拖，拉；迫使，硬拉；拖着脚步走
detailed_translations.english: to pull something along the ground, often because it is too heavy to carry

detailed_translations.chinese: 累赘； 一吸， 一抽
detailed_translations.english: If you take a drag on a cigarette or pipe that you are smoking, you take in air through it

name: bend
trans: n. 弯曲 vt. 使弯曲；使屈服；使致力；使朝向 vi. 弯曲，转弯；屈服；倾向；专心于

sentences.english: Lee bent and kissed her.
sentences.chinese: 李俯下身来亲她。

sentences.english: She bent her head.
sentences.chinese: 她低下头。

sentences.english: Bend your knees, but keep your back straight.
sentences.chinese: 膝盖弯曲，背部保持挺直。

detailed_translations.english: to move part of your body so that it is not straight or so that you are not upright
to become curved and no longer flat or straight
a curved part of something, especially a road or river

name: bow
trans: n. 弓；鞠躬；船首 adj. 弯曲的 vi. 鞠躬；弯腰 vt. 鞠躬；弯腰

sentences.english: She bowed and left the stage.
sentences.chinese: 她鞠了一躬，离开了舞台。

sentences.english: Corbett entered the room, bowing respectfully.
sentences.chinese: 科比特走进房间，恭敬地鞠了一躬。

sentences.english: The servant bowed low and handed his master the sealed note.
sentences.chinese: 仆人深深一鞠躬，把那个封好的短笺递给了主人。

sentences.english: This is done with a formal bow to the king or queen.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，还要向国王或女王正式鞠躬行礼。

detailed_translations.english: to bend the top part of your body forward in order to show respect for someone important, or as a way of thanking an  audience
the act of bending the top part of your body forward to show respect for someone when you meet them, or as a way of thanking an audience

name: stuff
trans: n. 东西；材料；填充物；素材资料 vt. 塞满；填塞；让吃饱 vi. 吃得过多

sentences.english: I’ve got some sticky stuff on my shoe.
sentences.chinese: 我鞋子上有什么黏糊糊的东西。

sentences.english: How do you think you’re going to fit all that stuff into the car?
sentences.chinese: 你说这么多东西你怎么装进车里？

sentences.english: I felt sorry for the ones who had to eat the awful stuff.
sentences.chinese: 我很同情那些只能吃这种难吃东西的人。

sentences.english: Where’s all the camping stuff?
sentences.chinese: 野营用的东西都在哪儿？

detailed_translations.english: used when you are talking about things such as substances, materials, or groups of objects when you do not know what they are called, or it is not important to say exactly what they are

name: item
trans: n. 条款，项目；一则；一件商品（或物品） adj. 又，同上 v. 记下；逐条列出

sentences.english: He opened the cardboard box and took out each item.
sentences.chinese: 他打开纸板箱把里面的物品一一拿出来。

sentences.english: The store is having a sale on furniture and household items.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店正在减价出售家具和家居用品。

sentences.english: luxury items such as exotic spices and perfumes
sentences.chinese: 异国香料和香水之类的奢侈品

sentences.english: The original 1965 bottle is now a collector’s item (= one of a set of objects people like to collect because they are interesting or valuable ).
sentences.chinese: 这瓶1965年生产的原装酒现在是收藏品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔尤指清单上、一群或一组事物中的〕一项，一件，一条
detailed_translations.english: a single thing, especially one thing in a list, group, or set of things

name: merchandise
trans: n. 商品；货物 vt. 买卖；推销 vi. 经商

sentences.english: A range of official Disney merchandise was on sale.
sentences.chinese: 一系列正版的迪士尼商品在出售。

sentences.english: They inspected the merchandise carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他们仔细地检查了商品。

detailed_translations.english: goods that are being sold
to try to sell goods or services using methods such as advertising

name: souvenir
trans: n. 纪念品；礼物 vt. 把…留作纪念

sentences.english: a souvenir shop
sentences.chinese: 纪念品商店

detailed_translations.english: an object that you buy or keep to remind yourself of a special occasion or a place you have visited

name: artefact
trans: n. 工艺品；人工制品，加工品

sentences.english: ancient Egyptian artefacts
sentences.chinese: 古埃及手工艺品

detailed_translations.chinese: 人工制品， 手工艺品
detailed_translations.english: an object such as a tool, weapon etc that was made in the past and is historically important

name: material
trans: adj. 重要的；物质的，实质性的；肉体的 n. 材料，原料；物资；布料

sentences.english: materials like wood or stone
sentences.chinese: 木材或石头之类的材料

sentences.english: harmful radioactive material
sentences.chinese: 有害的放射性材料

sentences.english: a paper company which imports raw materials (= substances which have not been treated ) from North America
sentences.chinese: 从北美进口原材料的纸业公司

sentences.english: recycled material
sentences.chinese: 再生材料

sentences.english: Anita is collecting material for a novel.
sentences.chinese: 安妮塔正在收集小说素材。

sentences.english: a society that places high importance on material rewards
sentences.chinese: 重视物质回报的社会

detailed_translations.english: a solid substance such as wood, plastic, or metal
relating to your money, possessions, living conditions etc, rather than the needs of your mind or soul

name: raw
trans: n. 擦伤处 adj. 生的；未加工的；阴冷的；刺痛的；擦掉皮的；无经验的；（在艺术等方面）不成熟的 vt. 擦伤

sentences.english: raw meat
sentences.chinese: 生肉

sentences.english: grated raw carrots
sentences.chinese: 磨碎的生胡萝卜

sentences.english: Cabbage can be eaten raw.
sentences.chinese: 洋白菜可以生吃。

sentences.english: raw sugar
sentences.chinese: 原糖

detailed_translations.english: not cooked

name: crude
trans: n. 原油；天然的物质 adj. 粗糙的；天然的，未加工的；粗鲁的

sentences.english: a crude wooden bridge
sentences.chinese: 粗糙的木桥

sentences.english: crude oil/metal
sentences.chinese: 原油；未经提炼的金属

detailed_translations.english: not developed to a high standard, or made with little skill

name: necessity
trans: n. 需要；必然性；必需品

sentences.english: I’m afraid it’s become a matter of economic necessity.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕这已成了一个经济需求的问题。

detailed_translations.english: when something is necessary

name: outfit
trans: n. 机构；用具；全套装备 vi. 得到装备 vt. 配备；供应

sentences.english: She bought a new outfit for the party.
sentences.chinese: 她为了这次派对买了套新衣服。

sentences.english: a cowboy outfit
sentences.chinese: 一套牛仔服装

detailed_translations.english: a set of clothes worn together, especially for a special occasion
to provide someone or something with a set of clothes or equipment, especially ones that are needed for a particular purpose

name: kit
trans: n. 工具箱；成套工具 vt. 装备 vi. 装备

sentences.english: Sally keeps her make-up kit in her bag.
sentences.chinese: 萨莉把化妆包放在手提包里。

sentences.english: a bike repair kit
sentences.chinese: 一套自行车修理工具

sentences.english: a shaving kit
sentences.chinese: 一套剃须用具

sentences.english: a drum kit
sentences.chinese: 一套架子鼓

detailed_translations.english: a set of tools, equipment etc that you use for a particular purpose or activity

name: utensil
trans: n. 用具，器皿

sentences.english: kitchen utensils
sentences.chinese: 厨房用具

detailed_translations.english: a thing such as a knife, spoon etc that you use when you are cooking

name: garbage
trans: n. 垃圾；废物

sentences.english: Can you take out the garbage when you go?
sentences.chinese: 你走的时候把垃圾带出去好吗？

detailed_translations.english: waste material, such as paper, empty containers, and food thrown away

name: rubbish
trans: n. 垃圾，废物；废话 adj. 毫无价值的

sentences.english: a rubbish bin
sentences.chinese: 垃圾桶

detailed_translations.english: food, paper etc that is no longer needed and has been thrown away

name: trash
trans: n. 垃圾；废物 vt. 丢弃；修剪树枝

sentences.english: Will someone take out the trash (= take it outside the house ) ?
sentences.chinese: 谁把垃圾拿出去好吗？

sentences.english: Just put it in the trash .
sentences.chinese: 就把它扔到垃圾桶里吧。

detailed_translations.english: things that you throw away, such as empty bottles, used papers, food that has gone bad etc

name: recycle
trans: n. 再生；再循环；重复利用 vt. 使再循环；使…重新利用 vi. 重复利用

sentences.english: The fashion world just keeps recycling old ideas.
sentences.chinese: 时装界就是不停地翻新旧观念。

detailed_translations.english: to use something such as an idea, writing etc again instead of developing something new

name: reuse
trans: n. 重新使用，再用 vt. 再使用

sentences.english: Copper, brass, and aluminium are separated and remelted for reuse.
sentences.chinese: 铜、黄铜和铝被分门别类重新熔化以供再利用。

detailed_translations.english: Reuse is also a noun
to use something again

name: litter
trans: n. 垃圾；轿，担架；一窝（动物的幼崽）；凌乱 vt. 乱丢；给…垫褥草；把…弄得乱七八糟 vi. 产仔；乱扔废弃物

sentences.english: People who drop litter can be fined in some cities.
sentences.chinese: 在有些城市，乱扔垃圾的人会被罚款。

sentences.english: A litter of notes, papers, and textbooks were strewn on the desk.
sentences.chinese: 一堆笔记、考卷和课本乱七八糟地摊在桌子上。

sentences.english: The floor was littered with papers.
sentences.chinese: 地板上乱七八糟扔了许多报纸。

detailed_translations.english: waste paper, cans etc that people have thrown away and left on the ground in a public place
to leave waste paper, cans etc on the ground in a public place

name: waste
trans: n. 浪费；废物；荒地；损耗；地面风化物 adj. 废弃的；多余的；荒芜的 vt. 浪费；消耗；使荒芜 vi. 浪费；变消瘦；挥霍钱财

sentences.english: excessive waste in state spending
sentences.chinese: 政府支出方面的过度浪费

detailed_translations.chinese: 浪费；废物；荒地；损耗；地面风化物
detailed_translations.english: when something such as money or skills are not used in a way that is effective, useful, or sensible
to use more money, time, energy etc than is useful or sensible
waste materials, substances etc are unwanted because the good part of them has been removed

name: junk
trans: n. 垃圾，废物；舢板

sentences.english: This cupboard’s full of junk.
sentences.chinese: 这个壁橱里塞满了杂物。

detailed_translations.english: old or unwanted objects that have no use or value
to get rid of something because it is old or useless

name: landfill
trans: n. 垃圾填埋地；垃圾堆

sentences.english: ...the environmental costs of landfill.
sentences.chinese: …垃圾填埋法对环境的损害。

detailed_translations.english: Landfill is a method of getting rid of very large amounts of rubbish by burying it in a large deep hole

name: sewerage
trans: n. 下水道系统

sentences.english: ...without access to any services such as water or sewerage.
sentences.chinese: ...不能享受任何如供水或污水处理的服务。

detailed_translations.english: the system by which waste material and used water are carried away in sewers and then treated to stop it being harmful

name: detergent
trans: n. 清洁剂；去垢剂

sentences.english: During dry place, keep within the new air circulation, avoid rain and insolate, also can use some detergent to remove odor.
sentences.chinese: 在晾置期间，要保持新居内空气的流通，避免雨淋及曝晒，还可采用一些去除气味的清洁剂。

detailed_translations.english: a liquid or powder used for washing clothes, dishes etc

name: lotion
trans: n. 洗液；洗涤剂

sentences.english: suntan lotion
sentences.chinese: 防晒露

detailed_translations.english: a liquid mixture that you put on your skin or hair to clean,  soften  , or protect it

name: shampoo
trans: n. 洗发；洗发精 vt. 洗发

sentences.english: What kind of shampoo do you use?
sentences.chinese: 你用的是哪种洗发水？

sentences.english: a bottle of shampoo
sentences.chinese: 一瓶香波

detailed_translations.english: a liquid soap for washing your hair
to wash something with shampoo

name: soap
trans: n. 肥皂 vt. 将肥皂涂在……上；对……拍马屁（俚语） vi. 用肥皂擦洗

sentences.english: Wash thoroughly with soap and water .
sentences.chinese: 用肥皂和水彻底洗一洗。

sentences.english: a bar of soap
sentences.chinese: 一块肥皂

detailed_translations.english: the substance that you use to wash your body

detailed_translations.chinese: 将肥皂涂在……上；对……拍马屁（俚语）
detailed_translations.english: to rub soap on or over someone or something

name: tub
trans: n. 浴盆；桶 vt. 把…装入桶；为…洗盆浴 vi. 洗盆浴；（衣服等）被放在桶里洗

sentences.english: I had a long soak in the tub.
sentences.chinese: 我在浴缸里泡了很久。

detailed_translations.english: a large container in which you sit to wash yourself

detailed_translations.chinese: 洗盆浴；（衣服等）被放在桶里洗

name: plug
trans: n. 插头；塞子；栓 vt. 插入；塞住；接插头 vi. 塞住；用插头将与电源接通

sentences.english: the bath plug
sentences.chinese: 浴缸塞子

sentences.english: an electric plug
sentences.chinese: 电源插头

sentences.english: We used mud to plug up the holes in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 我们用泥堵住了房顶上的漏洞

detailed_translations.english: a round flat piece of rubber used for stopping the water flowing out of a bath or  sink
to fill or block a small hole

name: tap
trans: n. 水龙头；轻打 vt. 轻敲；轻打；装上嘴子 vi. 轻拍；轻击；轻叩 vt. 采用，利用

sentences.english: She felt a tap on her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得有人轻轻拍了拍她的肩膀。

sentences.english: I went up and tapped on the window.
sentences.chinese: 我走上去轻轻敲敲窗户。

detailed_translations.english: an act of hitting something lightly, especially to get someone’s attention
to hit your fingers lightly on something, for example to get someone’s attention

name: pipe
trans: n. 管；烟斗；笛 vt. 用管道输送；尖声唱；用管乐器演奏 vi. 吹笛；尖叫

sentences.english: a water pipe
sentences.chinese: 水管

sentences.english: a frozen waste pipe
sentences.chinese: 冻住的污水管

sentences.english: copper pipes
sentences.chinese: 铜管

sentences.english: A pipe had burst in the kitchen and flooded the floor.
sentences.chinese: 厨房的一根管道爆裂，弄得满地都是水。

detailed_translations.english: a tube through which a liquid or gas flows
to make a musical sound, using a pipe

name: tube
trans: n. 管；电子管；隧道；电视机 vt. 使成管状；把…装管；用管输送 vi. 乘地铁；不及格

sentences.english: a tube of toothpaste
sentences.chinese: 一管牙膏

detailed_translations.english: a round pipe made of metal, glass, rubber etc, especially for liquids or gases to go through

detailed_translations.chinese: 使成管状；把…装管；用管输送

name: mop
trans: vt. 擦干；用拖把拖洗 vi. 用拖把擦洗地板；扮鬼脸 n. 拖把；蓬松的头发；鬼脸

sentences.english: a mop and bucket
sentences.chinese: 拖把和水桶

sentences.english: She carried on mopping the floor.
sentences.chinese: 她继续用拖把拖地。

sentences.english: It was so hot he had to keep stopping to mop his face.
sentences.chinese: 天气太热，他只得不时停下来擦一擦脸。

detailed_translations.english: a thing used for washing floors, consisting of a long stick with threads of thick string or a piece of  sponge  fastened to one end

detailed_translations.chinese: 用拖把拖；擦；用拖把拖；擦
detailed_translations.english: to wash a floor with a wet mop

name: broom
trans: n. 扫帚；金雀花 vt. 扫除 vi. 桩顶开花或开裂

sentences.english: The lobby is empty but for the postman and his broom.
sentences.chinese: 大厅里除了邮差和他的扫帚以外别无他人。

sentences.english: As a rule, where the broom does not reach the dust will not vanish of itself.
sentences.chinese: 扫帚不到, 灰尘照例不会自己跑掉。

detailed_translations.english: a large brush with a long handle, used for sweeping floors

name: sweep
trans: n. 打扫，扫除；范围；全胜 vt. 扫除；猛拉；掸去 vi. 扫，打扫；席卷；扫视；袭击

sentences.english: Bert swept the path in front of the house.
sentences.chinese: 伯特清扫了屋前的小路。

sentences.english: Thunderstorms swept the country.
sentences.chinese: 雷暴横扫全国。

detailed_translations.english: to clean the dust, dirt etc from the floor or ground, using a brush with a long handle

name: mattress
trans: n. 床垫；褥子；空气垫

sentences.english: The ten young people sleep between two hard, narrow beds and one large mattress on the floor with no privacy at all.
sentences.chinese: 十个年轻人就睡在两张窄小的硬板床和地板上的一张大床垫上，没有任何隐私可言。

sentences.english: If someone pokes fun at your mattress on the floor, or teases you about your empty cabinets, smile and take it in stride.
sentences.chinese: 如果有人取笑你放在地板上的床垫，或揶揄你空空的橱柜，请面带微笑从容应对此事。

sentences.english: She laid a spring mattress under the sheet.
sentences.chinese: 她在床单下面铺了一个弹簧床垫。

detailed_translations.english: the soft part of a bed that you lie on

name: carpet
trans: n. 地毯；地毯状覆盖物 vt. 在…上铺地毯，把地毯铺在…上；斥责

sentences.english: The building has been carpeted throughout.
sentences.chinese: 大楼里上上下下都铺了地毯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…上铺地毯，把地毯铺在…上；斥责
detailed_translations.english: to cover a floor with carpet
heavy woven material for covering floors or stairs, or a piece of this material

name: rug
trans: n. 小地毯；毛皮地毯；男子假发

sentences.english: A Persian rug covered the hardwood floors.
sentences.chinese: 一张波斯小地毯铺在了那硬木地板上。

sentences.english: The old lady was seated in her chair at the window, a rug over her knees.
sentences.chinese: 这位老妇人坐在靠窗的椅子上，膝上盖着一块小毛毯。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of thick cloth or wool that covers part of a floor, used for warmth or as a decoration

name: mat
trans: n. 垫；垫子；衬边 vt. 缠结；铺席于……上 vi. 纠缠在一起 adj. 无光泽的

sentences.english: Wipe your feet on the mat.
sentences.chinese: 在地垫上蹭蹭你的鞋底。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of thick rough material which covers part of a floor
to tangle or weave or become tangled or woven into a dense mass

name: cushion
trans: n. 垫子；起缓解作用之物；（猪等的）臀肉；银行储蓄 vt. 给…安上垫子；把…安置在垫子上；缓和…的冲击

sentences.english: a velvet cushion
sentences.chinese: 天鹅绒垫子

sentences.english: a cushion cover
sentences.chinese: 垫子套

detailed_translations.chinese: 垫子；起缓解作用之物；（猪等的）臀肉；银行储蓄
detailed_translations.english: a cloth bag filled with soft material that you put on a chair or the floor to make it more comfortable

detailed_translations.chinese: 给…安上垫子；把…安置在垫子上；缓和…的冲击
detailed_translations.english: to make the effect of a fall or hit less painful, for example by having something soft in the way

name: pad
trans: n. 衬垫；护具；便笺簿；填补 vi. 步行；放轻脚步走 vt. 填补；走

sentences.english: Use an abrasive pad for stubborn stains.
sentences.chinese: 用百洁布擦洗顽固污渍。

sentences.english: Keep a telephone pad and a pen to hand.
sentences.chinese: 手边准备一本电话记事簿和一支笔。

sentences.english: All the sharp corners were padded with foam.
sentences.chinese: 所有的棱角都垫上了泡沫塑料。

detailed_translations.english: a thick flat object made of cloth or rubber, used to protect or clean something, or to make something more comfortable
to put a layer of soft material in or on sth in order to protect it, make it thicker or change its shape

name: blanket
trans: n. 毛毯，毯子；毯状物，覆盖层 adj. 总括的，全体的；没有限制的 vt. 覆盖，掩盖；用毯覆盖

sentences.english: She huddled herself in the blanket.
sentences.chinese: 她用毯子紧紧裹住自己。

sentences.english: They muffled up her head with a blanket.
sentences.chinese: 他们用毯子蒙住了她的头。

sentences.english: He lapped his daughter in a warm blanket.
sentences.chinese: 他把女儿裹在一个暖和的毯子里。

detailed_translations.english: a cover for a bed, usually made of wool

name: quilt
trans: n. 被子；棉被 vt. 东拼西凑地编；加软衬料后缝制 vi. 缝被子

sentences.english: ...an old patchwork quilt.
sentences.chinese: …一条旧的拼布被子。

sentences.english: Maggie knows how to quilt.
sentences.chinese: 玛吉知道怎样缝被子。

sentences.english: Quilting a bed cover can be laborious.
sentences.chinese: 缝制一个床罩会很费力的。

detailed_translations.english: a warm thick cover for a bed, made by sewing two layers of cloth together, with feathers or a thick material in between them
If you quilt, or if you quilt a piece of fabric, you make a quilt

name: sheet
trans: n. 薄片，纸张；薄板；床单 adj. 片状的 vt. 覆盖；盖上被单；使成大片 vi. 成片流动；大片落下

sentences.english: I’ll go and find you some clean sheets and blankets.
sentences.chinese: 我去给你们找些干净的床单和毯子。

sentences.english: white cotton sheets
sentences.chinese: 白色的棉布床单

sentences.english: a sheet of paper with names and numbers on it
sentences.chinese: 写了姓名和电话号码的一张纸

sentences.english: a sheet of glass
sentences.chinese: 一块玻璃

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of thin cloth that you put on a bed to lie on or lie under

name: pillow
trans: n. 枕头 vt. 垫；枕于…；使…靠在 vi. 枕着头；靠在枕上

sentences.english: I’ll be asleep as soon as my head hits the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 我头一碰到枕头就会睡着。

detailed_translations.english: a cloth bag filled with soft material that you put your head on when you are sleeping
to rest your head somewhere

name: sponge
trans: n. 海绵；海绵状物 vt. 抹掉；用海绵擦拭；讨得 vi. 采集海绵；过寄生生活；海绵般地吸收

sentences.english: Clean the rug by sponging it gently.
sentences.chinese: 用湿布轻轻擦洗以清洁小地毯。

detailed_translations.english: to put paint on a surface using a sponge
a piece of a soft natural or artificial substance full of small holes, which can suck up liquid and is used for washing

name: towel
trans: n. 毛巾，手巾；[纸] 纸巾 vi. 用毛巾擦干身体 vt. 用毛巾擦

sentences.english: Have you got a clean towel I could use?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有干净毛巾给我用？

detailed_translations.english: a piece of cloth that you use for drying your skin or for drying things such as dishes
to dry yourself using a towel

name: staple
trans: n. 主要产品；订书钉；主题；主食 adj. 主要的，大宗生产的；常用的；纺织纤维的 vt. 把…分级；钉住

sentences.english: Oil is Nigeria’s staple export.
sentences.chinese: 石油是尼日利亚的主要出口产品。

sentences.english: a staple ingredient of comedy
sentences.chinese: 喜剧最重要的成分

detailed_translations.chinese: 主要的； 经常需要的
detailed_translations.english: forming the greatest or most important part of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 订书钉，U形钉；主食；主要产品
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of thin wire that is pushed into sheets of paper and bent over to hold them together
to fasten two or more things together with a staple

name: nail
trans: vt. 钉；使固定；揭露 n. [解剖] 指甲；钉子

sentences.english: The key was hanging on a nail by the door.
sentences.chinese: 钥匙挂在门边的一颗钉子上。

sentences.english: Stop biting your nails!
sentences.chinese: 别咬指甲！

sentences.english: A sign saying ‘No Fishing’ had been nailed to the tree.
sentences.chinese: 树上钉着一块写有“禁止钓鱼”的牌子。

detailed_translations.english: a thin pointed piece of metal with a flat top, which you hit into a surface with a hammer, for example to join things together or to hang something on
to fasten something to something else with nails

name: razor
trans: n. 剃刀 vt. 剃，用剃刀刮

sentences.english: BATHROOMS: A man has five items in his bathroom: a toothbrush, shaving cream, razor, a bar of soap, and a towel from the Holiday Inn.
sentences.chinese: 一个男人在他的盥洗室里有五件东西：一把牙刷，剃须膏，剃刀，一盒肥皂和从假日旅馆顺来的一条毛巾。

detailed_translations.english: a tool with a sharp blade, used to remove hair from your skin

name: shave
trans: vi. 剃须，剃毛 vt. 剃，削去；修剪；切成薄片；掠 n. 刮脸，剃胡子；修面；<口>侥幸逃过，幸免；剃刀，刮刀

sentences.english: He hadn’t shaved for days.
sentences.chinese: 他已经好几天没刮脸了。

sentences.english: Brian had cut himself shaving .
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩刮胡子时割破了脸。

detailed_translations.english: to cut off hair very close to the skin, especially from the face, using a  razor

name: fuse
trans: n. 保险丝，熔线；导火线，雷管 vt. 使融合；使熔化，使熔融 vi. 融合；熔化，熔融

sentences.english: two 13 amp fuses
sentences.chinese: 两根13安培的保险丝

sentences.english: I taught him how to change a fuse .
sentences.chinese: 我教他怎么换保险丝。

sentences.english: A bomb was deactivated at the last moment, after the fuse had been lit.
sentences.chinese: 一枚炸弹在导火线已被点燃后的最后一刻被解除。

sentences.english: The skull bones fuse between the ages of fifteen and twenty-five.
sentences.chinese: 颅骨在15和25岁之间长合。

detailed_translations.english: a short thin piece of wire inside electrical equipment which prevents damage by melting and stopping the electricity when there is too much power

detailed_translations.chinese: 结合; 融合; 熔合
detailed_translations.english: if electrical equipment fuses, or if you fuse it, it stops working because a fuse has melted

name: cable
trans: n. 缆绳；电缆；海底电报 vt. 打电报 vi. 打海底电报

sentences.english: The miners rode a conveyance attached to a cable made of braided steel wire.
sentences.chinese: 矿工们乘坐连着钢索的缆车。

sentences.english: cables and switches for computers
sentences.chinese: 电脑的缆线和开关

sentences.english: She sent a cable to her mother.
sentences.chinese: 她给母亲发了封电报。

detailed_translations.english: a thick strong metal rope used on ships, to support bridges etc

name: cord
trans: n. 绳索；束缚 vt. 用绳子捆绑

sentences.english: The robe was held at the waist by a cord.
sentences.chinese: 在袍子腰处束了根细绳。

sentences.english: He pulled explosives and some tangled cord from his bag.
sentences.chinese: 他从他的包里掏出炸药和一些乱糟糟的绳子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of thick string or thin rope

name: strand
trans: n. 线；串；海滨 vt. 使搁浅；使陷于困境；弄断；使落后 vi. 搁浅

sentences.english: She tried to blow a grey strand of hair from her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她试图吹开眼前的一缕白发。

sentences.english: The climbers had been stranded by a storm.
sentences.chinese: 这些登山者被暴风雨困住了。

detailed_translations.english: a single thin piece of thread, wire, hair etc
If you are stranded, you are prevented from leaving a place, for example because of bad weather

name: match
trans: vt. 使比赛；使相配；敌得过，比得上；相配；与…竞争 vi. 比赛；匹配；相配，相称；相比 n. 比赛，竞赛；匹配；对手；火柴

sentences.english: It’s our last match of the season.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们本赛季最后一场比赛。

sentences.english: They’re preparing for a big match tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为明天的一场大赛做准备。

sentences.english: McClaire’s goal earned him the title of man of the match (= the person in a team who plays best ) .
sentences.chinese: 麦克莱尔的进球为他赢得了“本场最佳球员”的称号。

sentences.english: Carlos was no match for the champion.
sentences.chinese: 卡洛斯根本不是冠军的对手。

detailed_translations.english: an organized sports event between two teams or people

name: candle
trans: n. 蜡烛；烛光；烛形物 vt. 对着光检查

sentences.english: The candle flickered in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 烛光在风中闪烁不定。

sentences.english: The candle flickered and then went out.
sentences.chinese: 一开始蜡烛摇曳不定， 然后就灭了。

sentences.english: When the candle was only half an inch high it flickered out and the room became dark.
sentences.chinese: 蜡烛只有半英寸长时，烛光忽闪忽闪地熄灭了，于是房间一片漆黑。

detailed_translations.english: a stick of  wax  with a string through the middle, which you burn to give light

name: wax
trans: n. 蜡；蜡状物 adj. 蜡制的；似蜡的 vt. 给…上蜡 vi. 月亮渐满；增大

sentences.english: wax crayons
sentences.chinese: 蜡笔

detailed_translations.english: a solid substance made of fat or oil and used to make candles, polish etc
to rub a layer of wax into a floor, surface etc to protect it or make it shine

name: portfolio
trans: n. 公文包；文件夹；证券投资组合；部长职务

sentences.english: an investment portfolio
sentences.chinese: 投资组合

detailed_translations.chinese: 公文包；文件夹；证券投资组合；部长职务
detailed_translations.english: a large flat case used especially for carrying pictures, documents etc

name: paperback
trans: n. 平装本；廉价本 adj. 纸面装订的；纸面平装本书籍的 vt. 以平装本出版

sentences.english: She said she would buy the book when it comes out in paperback.
sentences.chinese: 她说等那本书的平装本面市后她会买一本。

detailed_translations.english: A paperback is a book with a thin cardboard or paper cover. Compare .

detailed_translations.chinese: 纸面装订的；纸面平装本书籍的

name: pamphlet
trans: n. 小册子

sentences.english: a political pamphlet
sentences.chinese: 政治宣传册

detailed_translations.english: a very thin book with paper covers, that gives information about something

name: tissue
trans: n. 组织；纸巾；薄纱；一套 vt. 饰以薄纱；用化妆纸揩去

sentences.english: ...a small package wrapped in tissue paper.
sentences.chinese: …一个小包裹，用薄棉纸包着。

sentences.english: As we age we lose muscle tissue.
sentences.chinese: 随着年纪的增大，我们会失去一些肌肉组织。

detailed_translations.english: light thin paper used for wrapping, packing etc

name: cover
trans: n. 封面，封皮；盖子；掩蔽物;幌子，借口 vt. 包括；采访，报导；涉及 vi. 覆盖；代替

sentences.english: I’d just returned from covering the Cambodian war.
sentences.chinese: 我刚报道完柬埔寨战争回来。

detailed_translations.english: to report the details of an event for a newspaper or a television or radio programme

name: Xerox
trans: n. 施乐（商标名，美国办公设备制造公司）；影印，静电印刷品 vt. 用静电复印法复印

name: duplicate
trans: n. 副本；复制品 adj. 复制的；二重的 vt. 复制；使加倍 vi. 复制；重复

sentences.english: A duplicate copy should be made for the county record office.
sentences.chinese: 应该制作一个副本呈交县档案室。

sentences.english: a duplicate key
sentences.chinese: 配制的钥匙

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全一样的， 复制的
detailed_translations.english: exactly the same as something, or made as an exact copy of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全一样的东西，复制品
detailed_translations.english: an exact copy of something that you can use in the same way

detailed_translations.chinese: 复制， 复印； 重复
detailed_translations.english: to copy something exactly

name: memorandum
trans: n. 备忘录；便笺

sentences.english: ...a memorandum from the Department of Defense on its role.
sentences.chinese: …一份来自国防部的有关其角色的备忘录。

detailed_translations.english: a  memo

name: stationery
trans: n. 文具；信纸

sentences.english: a letter on hotel stationery
sentences.chinese: 用酒店信纸写的信

sentences.english: envelopes and other office stationery
sentences.chinese: 信封及其他办公文具

detailed_translations.english: paper for writing letters, usually with matching envelopes

name: glue
trans: n. 胶；各种胶合物 vt. 粘合；似胶般固着于

sentences.english: a tube of glue
sentences.chinese: 一管胶水

sentences.english: The sheets are glued together with strong adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 薄板用强力胶粘在一起。

detailed_translations.english: a sticky substance used for joining things together
to join two things together using glue

name: ink
trans: n. 墨水，墨汁；油墨 vt. 签署；涂墨水于

sentences.english: Please write in black ink.
sentences.chinese: 请用黑色墨水书写。

detailed_translations.english: a coloured liquid that you use for writing, printing or drawing

name: rubber
trans: n. 橡胶；橡皮；合成橡胶；按摩师 adj. 橡胶制成的 vt. 涂橡胶于；用橡胶制造 vi. 扭转脖子看；好奇地引颈而望

sentences.english: a rubber ball
sentences.chinese: 橡皮球

detailed_translations.chinese: 橡胶；橡皮；合成橡胶；按摩师
detailed_translations.english: a substance used to make tyres, boots etc, which is made from the juice of a tropical tree or artificially

name: scissors
trans: n. 剪刀；剪式跳法 v. 剪开；删除（scissor的第三人称单数）

sentences.english: a pair of scissors
sentences.chinese: 一把剪刀

detailed_translations.english: a tool for cutting paper, cloth etc, made of two sharp blades fastened together in the middle, with holes for your finger and thumb

detailed_translations.chinese: 剪开；删除（scissor的第三人称单数）

name: shear
trans: n. [力] 切变；修剪；大剪刀 vi. 剪；剪切；修剪 vt. 剪；修剪；剥夺

sentences.english: Though shorn of some of its powers, the party remains in control.
sentences.chinese: 虽然被削去了一些权力，该党仍然掌握着控制权。

sentences.english: Trim the shrubs with shears.
sentences.chinese: 用大剪刀修剪这些灌木。

detailed_translations.english: to cut the wool off a sheep
A pair of shears is a garden tool like a very large pair of scissors. Shears are used especially for cutting hedges.

name: edge
trans: n. 边缘；优势；刀刃；锋利 vt. 使锐利；将…开刃；给…加上边 vi. 缓缓移动；侧着移动

sentences.english: Put the eggs in the centre of the dish, with the vegetables and herbs around the edge.
sentences.chinese: 把鸡蛋放在盘子中间，盘边一圈放些蔬菜和香草。

sentences.english: He stood at the water’s edge staring across the lake.
sentences.chinese: 他站在水边，凝视着湖对面。

sentences.english: A leaf was on the ground, curling up at the edges.
sentences.chinese: 地上有一片叶子，叶边卷曲着。

sentences.english: a knife with a sharp edge
sentences.chinese: 刀刃锋利的小刀

detailed_translations.english: the part of an object that is furthest from its centre

name: rim
trans: n. 边，边缘；轮辋；圆圈 vt. 作…的边，装边于 vi. 作…的边，装边于

sentences.english: She looked at him over the rim of her glass.
sentences.chinese: 她沿玻璃杯口看着他。

detailed_translations.english: the outside edge of something circular
to be around the edge of something

name: element
trans: n. 元素；要素；原理；成分；自然环境

sentences.english: Business and management elements are built into the course.
sentences.chinese: 本课程加入了商务和管理方面的内容。

sentences.english: Hydrogen is a one-valence element.
sentences.chinese: 氢是一价的元素。

detailed_translations.english: one part or feature of a whole system, plan, piece of work etc, especially one that is basic or important

name: factor
trans: n. 因素；要素；[物] 因数；代理人 vt. 把…作为因素计入；代理经营；把…分解成 vi. 做代理商

sentences.english: The rise in crime is mainly due to social and economic factors.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率上升主要由社会和经济因素造成。

detailed_translations.chinese: 因素， 因子； 系数
detailed_translations.english: one of several things that influence or cause a situation

name: section
trans: n. 截面；部分；部门；地区；章节 vt. 把…分段；将…切片；对…进行划分 vi. 被切割成片；被分成部分

sentences.english: The plane’s tail section was found in a cornfield.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的尾部在玉米田里找到了。

sentences.english: the smoking section (= where you can smoke )
sentences.chinese: 吸烟区

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts that something such as an object or place is divided into

name: tag
trans: n. 标签；名称；结束语；附属物 vt. 尾随，紧随；连接；起浑名；添饰 vi. 紧随

sentences.english: You just search for an artist, song, album , or just a random search tag.
sentences.chinese: 你只需要搜索艺术家、歌曲、相册、或者仅仅是一个随机搜索标签。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of paper, plastic etc attached to something to show what it is, who owns it, what it costs etc
to attach a tag to something

name: label
trans: vt. 标注；贴标签于 n. 标签；商标；签条

sentences.english: a luggage label
sentences.chinese: 行李标签

detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper or another material that is attached to something and gives information about it
to attach a label onto something or write information on something

name: badge
trans: n. 徽章；证章；标记 vt. 授给…徽章

sentences.english: We were each handed a badge with our name on it.
sentences.chinese: 我们每个人都拿到一个徽章，上面有我们的名字。

sentences.english: He now sees his wartime injuries as a badge of honor.
sentences.chinese: 现在，他把自己在战争中受的伤看成是一种光荣标记。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of metal or plastic, with a design or words on it, that a person wears to show that they belong to an organization, support sth, have achieved sth, have a particular rank, etc.

name: bolt
trans: n. 螺栓，螺钉；闪电，雷电；门闩；弩箭;（布的）一匹，一卷 vt. 筛选；囫囵吞下；（把门、窗等）闩上；突然说出，脱口说出 vi. （门窗等）闩上，拴住；冲出，跳出；（马等的）脱缰；囫囵吞下 adv. 突然地；像箭似地；直立地

sentences.english: Was this money a bolt from the blue or did you know you were going to get it?
sentences.chinese: 这是一笔意料之财呢，还是你本来就知道会有的？

sentences.english: The pig rose squealing and bolted.
sentences.chinese: 那头猪尖叫着站起来，飞快地跑开了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 螺栓，螺钉；闪电，雷电；门闩；弩箭;（布的）一匹，一卷
detailed_translations.english: a screw with a flat head and no point, for fastening things together

detailed_translations.chinese: 筛选；囫囵吞下；（把门、窗等）闩上；突然说出，脱口说出
detailed_translations.english: to lock a door or window by sliding a bolt across

detailed_translations.chinese: 突然地；像箭似地；直立地
detailed_translations.english: If a person or animal bolts, they suddenly start to run very fast, often because something has frightened them

name: knob
trans: n. 把手；瘤；球形突出物 vi. 鼓起 vt. 使有球形突出物

sentences.english: He thought the door was locked, but he turned the knob and the door opened.
sentences.chinese: 他本以为门是锁住的，但是转了一下把手门就开了。

sentences.english: a brass door knob
sentences.chinese: 黄铜门把手

sentences.english: I adjusted the volume knob and sat down.
sentences.chinese: 我调节好音量旋钮，坐了下来。

detailed_translations.english: a round handle or thing that you turn to open a door, turn on a television etc

name: handle
trans: n. [建] 把手；柄；手感；口实 vt. 处理；操作；运用；买卖；触摸 vi. 搬运；易于操纵

sentences.english: I handled most of the paperwork.
sentences.chinese: 大部分文书工作是我做的。

sentences.english: The case is being handled by a top lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 此案正由一位顶尖律师负责处理。

sentences.english: The finance department handles all the accounts.
sentences.chinese: 财务部处理所有账目。

sentences.english: Computers can handle huge amounts of data.
sentences.chinese: 计算机能处理大量数据。

detailed_translations.english: to do the things that are necessary to complete a job

name: shutter
trans: n. 快门；百叶窗；关闭物；遮板 vt. 为…装百叶窗；以百叶窗遮闭

sentences.english: There are a few things you should check before pressing the shutter release.
sentences.chinese: 在按快门之前，有几件事情你应该检查。

detailed_translations.chinese: 快门；百叶窗；关闭物；遮板
detailed_translations.english: one of a pair of wooden or metal covers on the outside of a window that can be closed to keep light out or prevent thieves from coming in

detailed_translations.chinese: 为…装百叶窗；以百叶窗遮闭

name: curtain
trans: n. 幕；窗帘 vt. 遮蔽；装上门帘

sentences.english: red velvet curtains
sentences.chinese: 红色的丝绒窗帘

sentences.english: Before the curtain went up, the dancers took their places on stage.
sentences.chinese: 幕拉起之前，舞蹈演员都在舞台上站好了位置。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of hanging cloth that can be pulled across to cover a window, divide a room etc

name: pane
trans: n. 窗格；边；面；窗格玻璃；嵌板 vt. 装窗玻璃于；镶嵌板于

sentences.english: a window pane
sentences.chinese: 一块窗玻璃

sentences.english: a pane of glass
sentences.chinese: 一块玻璃

detailed_translations.chinese: 窗格；边；面；窗格玻璃；嵌板
detailed_translations.english: a piece of glass used in a window or door

name: opacity
trans: n. 不透明；不传导；暧昧

sentences.english: Opacity of the eye lens can be induced by deficiency of certain vitamins.
sentences.chinese: 眼球晶状体的混浊可由缺乏某些维生素引起。

detailed_translations.english: the quality that something has when it is difficult to see through

name: jar
trans: n. 罐；广口瓶；震动；刺耳声 vi. 冲突；不一致；震惊；发刺耳声 vt. 震动；刺激；使震动

sentences.english: a jam jar
sentences.chinese: 果酱罐

sentences.english: half a jar of peanut butter
sentences.chinese: 半瓶花生酱

sentences.english: The ship jarred a little.
sentences.chinese: 船轻微震了一下。

sentences.english: The sudden movement jarred the box and it fell off the table.
sentences.chinese: 这突然一动震动了那个箱子，然后它从桌上掉了下去。

detailed_translations.english: a glass container with a wide top and a lid, used for storing food such as jam or honey, or the amount it contains

detailed_translations.chinese: 冲突；不一致；震惊；发刺耳声
detailed_translations.english: If an object jars, or if something jars it, the object moves with a fairly hard shaking movement

name: barrel
trans: n. 桶；枪管，炮管 vt. 把……装入桶内 vi. 快速移动

sentences.english: The wine is aged in oak barrels.
sentences.chinese: 这种葡萄酒是用橡木酒桶放陈的。

detailed_translations.english: a large curved container with a flat top and bottom, made of wood or metal, and used for storing beer, wine etc

name: bucket
trans: n. 桶，水桶；铲斗；一桶的量 v. 倾盆而下；颠簸着行进

sentences.english: He let down a bucket into the well to draw water.
sentences.chinese: 他把吊桶放进井里打水。

detailed_translations.english: an open container with a handle, used for carrying and holding things, especially liquids

name: pail
trans: n. 桶，提桶

sentences.english: a milk pail
sentences.chinese: 牛奶桶

detailed_translations.english: a metal or wooden container with a handle, used for carrying liquids

name: phone
trans: n. 电话；耳机，听筒 vt. 打电话 vi. 打电话

sentences.english: Much of his work is done by phone .
sentences.chinese: 他的工作大部分是通过电话进行的。

sentences.english: Who was that on the phone ?
sentences.chinese: 谁来的电话？

sentences.english: I wish Amy would get off the phone .
sentences.chinese: 我真希望埃米别再打电话了。

detailed_translations.english: a telephone

name: bell
trans: n. 铃，钟；钟声，铃声；钟状物 vt. 装钟于，系铃于 vi. 鸣钟；成钟状鼓起

sentences.english: church bells
sentences.chinese: 教堂的钟

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electrical equipment that makes a ringing sound, used as a signal or to get someone’s attention

name: camera
trans: n. 照相机；摄影机

sentences.english: Her grandmother lent her a camera for a school trip to Venice and Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 她的祖母借给她一部相机，让她在学校组织的到威尼斯和埃及的旅行中使用。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment used to take photographs or make films or television programmes

name: portable
trans: n. 手提式打字机 adj. 手提的，便携式的；轻便的

sentences.english: a portable radio
sentences.chinese: 便携式收音机

detailed_translations.english: able to be carried or moved easily

name: spotlight
trans: n. 聚光灯；反光灯；公众注意的中心 vt. 聚光照明；使公众注意

sentences.english: The yard was lit by three huge spotlights.
sentences.chinese: 院子里亮着三盏巨大的聚光灯。

detailed_translations.english: a light with a very bright beam which can be directed at someone or something. Spotlights are often used to light a stage when actors or singers are performing
to shine a strong beam of light on something

name: lantern
trans: n. 灯笼；提灯；灯笼式天窗

sentences.english: Colour the tiger lantern brown .
sentences.chinese: 把老虎灯笼涂成棕色。

sentences.english: Lantern owners write riddles on a piece of paper and post them on the lanterns.
sentences.chinese: 灯笼的所有者将谜语写在一张纸条上，然后将纸条展示在灯笼上。

sentences.english: To cheer themselves as well as they could, they made an artificial morning with the lantern, some bread and butter, and their own conversation, the real morning being far from come.
sentences.chinese: 为了尽量使自己高兴起来，他们就用提灯制造出人造的黎明，吃着黄油面包，谈天说地，其实真正的黎明还远没有到来。

detailed_translations.english: a lamp that you can carry, consisting of a metal container with glass sides that surrounds a flame or light

name: bulb
trans: n. 电灯泡；鳞茎；球状物 vi. 生球茎；膨胀成球状

sentences.english: a 100-watt bulb
sentences.chinese: 一个100瓦的灯泡

detailed_translations.english: the glass part of an electric light, that the light shines from

name: flashlight
trans: n. 手电筒；闪光灯

sentences.english: Wicky peeked at John's flashlight.
sentences.chinese: 威奇向约翰的手电筒瞥了一眼。

sentences.english: Do you have a flashlight?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有手电筒？

detailed_translations.english: a small electric light that you can carry in your hand

name: refrigerator
trans: n. 冰箱，冷藏库

sentences.english: My refrigerator suddenly started kicking up yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我的冰箱昨晚突然出了故障。

sentences.english: The minute Tom came home he beelined for the refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆一回到家就直奔冰箱而来。

sentences.english: Letters have been pouring into the office complaining about this kind of refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 办公室连续收到大批信件抱怨这种电冰箱。

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of electrical kitchen equipment, shaped like a cupboard, used for keeping food and drink cool

name: fridge
trans: n. 电冰箱

sentences.english: Then all three of you sign the contract and post in on the fridge.
sentences.chinese: 然后你们三个人要都在协议上签名，并把它贴在冰箱上。

sentences.english: I want this beer to chill so I'll leave it in the fridge for an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我想要啤酒变凉，因此我把它放在冰箱里一小时。

sentences.english: It can be anything: spoiled milk from the back of your fridge right down to tar and feathers.
sentences.chinese: 它可以是任何玩意儿：从你冰箱后面那些变质的牛奶到沥青和羽毛。

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of electrical kitchen equipment, used for keeping food and drinks cool

name: vacuum
trans: n. 真空；空间；真空吸尘器 adj. 真空的；利用真空的；产生真空的 vt. 用真空吸尘器清扫

sentences.english: I vacuumed the carpets today.
sentences.chinese: 我今天用吸尘器清洁地毯了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 收集； 用真空吸尘器打扫
detailed_translations.english: to clean using a vacuum cleaner
a space that is completely empty of all gas, especially one from which all the air has been taken away

name: fan
trans: n. 迷；风扇；爱好者 vt. 煽动；刺激；吹拂 vi. 成扇形散开；飘动

sentences.english: Groups of football fans began heading towards the ground.
sentences.chinese: 成群结队的球迷开始向球场走去。

detailed_translations.english: someone who likes a particular sport or performing art very much, or who admires a famous person

name: switch
trans: n. 开关；转换；鞭子 vi. 转换；抽打；换防 vt. 转换；用鞭子等抽打

sentences.english: The terrorists will switch tactics .
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子会改变战术。

detailed_translations.english: to change from doing or using one thing to doing or using another

name: hurdle
trans: n. 障碍；栏；跳栏 vt. 克服 vi. 克服；跳过

sentences.english: Finding enough money for the project was the first hurdle.
sentences.chinese: 第一道难关是为该项目筹措足够的资金。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or difficulty that you must deal with before you can achieve something

name: fence
trans: n. 栅栏；围墙；剑术 vt. 防护；用篱笆围住；练习剑术 vi. 击剑；搪塞；围以栅栏；跳过栅栏

sentences.english: Villagers say the fence would restrict public access to the hills.
sentences.chinese: 村民们说栅栏将限制公众进入山区。

detailed_translations.english: a structure made of wood, metal etc that surrounds a piece of land

detailed_translations.chinese: 防护；用篱笆围住；练习剑术
detailed_translations.english: to fight with a long thin sword as a sport

name: pedal
trans: n. 踏板；脚蹬子 vi. 踩踏板；骑车 vt. 骑（自行车）；踩……的踏板 adj. 脚的；脚踏的

sentences.english: She was pedalling furiously (= very fast ) .
sentences.chinese: 她飞快地踩着踏板。

detailed_translations.english: to ride a bicycle
one of the two parts of a bicycle that you push round with your feet to make the bicycle go forward
of or relating to the foot or feet

name: shelf
trans: n. 架子；搁板；搁板状物；暗礁

sentences.english: shelves of books
sentences.chinese: 一层层书架的书

sentences.english: supermarket shelves
sentences.chinese: 超级市场的货架

sentences.english: the amount of shelf space available
sentences.chinese: 可用的货架空间

detailed_translations.english: a long flat narrow board attached to a wall or in a frame or cupboard, used for putting things on

name: ladder
trans: n. 阶梯；途径；梯状物 vi. 成名；发迹 vt. 在……上装设梯子

sentences.english: She climbed up the ladder.
sentences.chinese: 她爬上梯子。

sentences.english: He hurt himself falling off a ladder.
sentences.chinese: 他从梯子上摔下来受了伤。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment used for climbing up to or down from high places. A ladder has two bars that are connected by rungs(= short bars that you use as steps ) .

name: lift
trans: vt. 举起；提升；鼓舞；空运；抄袭 vi. 消散；升起；耸立 n. 电梯；举起；起重机；搭车

sentences.english: Sophie lifted the phone before the second ring.
sentences.chinese: 铃响了一下苏菲就接起了电话。

sentences.english: He lifted the lid on the pot of soup.
sentences.chinese: 他揭开汤锅的盖子。

sentences.english: The lumber was lifted by crane and dropped into the truck.
sentences.chinese: 木材由起重机搬运到卡车上。

sentences.english: They took the lift down to the bar.
sentences.chinese: 他们乘电梯去楼下的酒吧。

sentences.english: It’s on the 3rd floor. Let’s use the lift.
sentences.chinese: 在三楼，我们乘电梯上去吧。

detailed_translations.english: to move something or someone upwards into the air
a machine that you can ride in, that moves up and down between the floors in a tall building

name: stool
trans: n. 凳子；粪便；厕所 vt. 引诱，诱捕 vi. 长新枝；分檗

sentences.english: a bar stool
sentences.chinese: 酒吧高凳

detailed_translations.english: a seat that has three or four legs, but no back or arms

name: drawer
trans: n. 抽屉；开票人；出票人；起草者；酒馆侍

sentences.english: She took a file from her desk drawer .
sentences.chinese: 她从书桌的抽屉里拿出了一个文件夹。

sentences.english: The scissors are in the kitchen drawer (= drawer in a piece of kitchen furniture ) .
sentences.chinese: 剪刀在厨房的抽屉里。

detailed_translations.english: part of a piece of furniture, such as a desk, that you pull out and push in and use to keep things in

name: umbrella
trans: n. 雨伞；保护伞；庇护；伞形结构

sentences.english: It started to rain, so Tricia stopped to put up her umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 开始下雨了，所以特里西娅停下来撑起雨伞。

sentences.english: I spent the day on the beach, lying under a beach umbrella, reading.
sentences.chinese: 那天我就在海滩上度过，躺在海滩遮阳伞下面看书。

detailed_translations.chinese: 雨伞；保护伞；庇护；伞形结构
detailed_translations.english: an object that you use to protect yourself against rain or hot sun. It consists of a circular folding frame covered in cloth.

name: raincoat
trans: n. （美）雨衣

sentences.english: He dipped in his raincoat pocket.
sentences.chinese: 他把手深深地伸进雨衣口袋里。

sentences.english: The dark clouds remembered me to take my raincoat along.
sentences.chinese: 乌云提醒我带上雨衣。

sentences.english: If I had taken my raincoat with me this morning, I would not be wet now.
sentences.chinese: (从句指过去,主句指现在)。如果我今天早上带了雨衣，现在就不会被淋湿了。

detailed_translations.english: a coat that you wear to protect yourself from rain

name: dredge
trans: n. 挖泥船，疏浚机；拖捞网 vt. （用挖泥船等）疏浚；（用拖捞网等）捞取；（在食物上）撒（面粉等） vi. 疏浚，挖掘；采捞

sentences.english: They dredged for oysters.
sentences.chinese: 他们在挖牡蛎。

detailed_translations.chinese: （用挖泥船等）疏浚；（用拖捞网等）捞取；（在食物上）撒（面粉等）
detailed_translations.english: to cover food lightly with flour, sugar etc
a machine, in the form of a bucket ladder, grab, or suction device, used to remove material from a riverbed, channel, etc

name: can
trans: aux. 能； 能够； 可以； 可能 n. 罐头； （用金属或塑料制作的）容器； （马口铁或其他金属制作的）食品罐头 vt. 将…装入密封罐中保存

sentences.english: ...fruits and vegetables that will be canned, skinned, diced, or otherwise processed.
sentences.chinese: …将要经过装罐、去皮、切块或其他加工程序的水果和蔬菜。

detailed_translations.english: When food or drink is canned, it is put into a metal container and sealed so that it will remain fresh.

name: mill
trans: vi. 乱转；被碾磨 n. 工厂；磨坊；磨粉机；制造厂；压榨机 vt. 搅拌；碾磨；磨细；使乱转

sentences.english: All our flours are milled using traditional methods.
sentences.chinese: 我们所有的面粉全是用传统方法碾磨的。

sentences.english: Add some freshly milled black pepper.
sentences.chinese: 加一些现磨的黑胡椒粉。

detailed_translations.english: to crush grain, pepper etc in a mill

detailed_translations.chinese: 磨坊；碾磨机；制造厂，工厂
detailed_translations.english: a building containing a large machine for crushing grain into flour

name: forge
trans: n. 熔炉，锻铁炉；铁工厂 vt. 伪造；锻造；前进 vi. 伪造；做锻工；前进

sentences.english: Someone stole my credit card and forged my signature.
sentences.chinese: 有人偷了我的信用卡，并假冒我的签名。

sentences.english: a forged passport
sentences.chinese: 假护照

detailed_translations.english: to move somewhere or continue doing something in a steady determined way
to illegally copy something, especially something printed or written, to make people think that it is real
a place where metal is heated and shaped into objects

name: alloy
trans: n. 合金 vt. 使成合金；使减低成色 vi. 易于铸成合金

sentences.english: Brass is an alloy of copper and zinc.
sentences.chinese: 黄铜是铜和锌的合金。

detailed_translations.english: to mix one metal with another
a metal that consists of two or more metals mixed together

name: metal
trans: n. 金属；合金 vt. 以金属覆盖 adj. 金属制的

sentences.english: The gate is made of metal.
sentences.chinese: 这扇大门是用金属做成的。

sentences.english: a small black metal box
sentences.chinese: 一个黑色的金属小盒子

sentences.english: They traded in gold and other precious metals (= valuable metals used especially for making jewellery ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们做黄金和其他贵金属的交易。

sentences.english: The old trucks were sold as scrap metal (= old metal that is melted and used again ) .
sentences.chinese: 这些旧卡车被当作金属废料卖掉了。

detailed_translations.english: a hard, usually shiny substance such as iron, gold, or steel

name: iron
trans: n. 熨斗；烙铁；坚强 adj. 铁的；残酷的；刚强的 vt. 熨；用铁铸成 vi. 熨衣；烫平

sentences.english: the iron and steel industry
sentences.chinese: 钢铁工业

sentences.english: a driveway with large iron gates
sentences.chinese: 安装了大铁门的私家车道

sentences.english: the absorption of iron from food
sentences.chinese: 对食物中铁的吸收

trans: n. 宝石，珍宝； 精华；受人重视者 vi. 点缀； 用宝石装饰； 饰以宝石 adj. 最佳品质的

trans: n. 翡翠；[宝] 碧玉；老马 adj. 玉制的；绿玉色的 vt. 使疲倦 vi. 疲倦

trans: n. 美发；理发

sentences.chinese: 黑色素是头发、皮肤以及眼睛中的深棕色色素。

a substance you use to change the colour of your clothes, hair etc

sentences.chinese: 这在 DB2 V7 环境中会导致一些问题，为了恢复到另一台服务器，您必须“伪装”成原先的节点，并且要知道它们各自的密码。

trans: n. 面纱；面罩；遮蔽物；托词 vt. 遮蔽；掩饰；以面纱遮掩；用帷幕分隔 vi. 蒙上面纱；出现轻度灰雾

sentences.chinese: 她用双手揭开面纱。

sentences.english: a bridal veil
sentences.chinese: 新娘的面纱

detailed_translations.chinese: 面纱，面罩；遮盖物，掩饰物

trans: n. 服装，装束；戏装，剧装 vt. 给…穿上服装

sentences.english: the film’s lavish costumes and spectacular sets

sentences.english: Hallowe’en costumes
sentences.chinese: 万圣节前夕化装服

trans: adj. 正派的；得体的；相当好的

sentences.chinese: 最精美的工艺

trans: n. 完成式 adj. 完美的；最好的；精通的 vt. 使完美；使熟练

sentences.chinese: 他的英语很地道。

sentences.chinese: 这辆车的车况极佳。

sentences.english: You’re very lucky to have perfect teeth.

sentences.chinese: 他老是批评妻子的外表。

sentences.english: We are often attracted to somebody first by their physical appearance .
sentences.chinese: 我们经常先被一个人的外貌吸引。

sentences.chinese: 总的来说，女性比男性更注重自己的仪容。

sentences.chinese: 她表面上很镇静，内心却十分担忧。

sentences.chinese: 金属柱子破坏了花园的外观。

sentences.chinese: 装饰菜能为任何菜肴增色。

sentences.chinese: 她是那种对自己的外貌感到自豪的女人。

sentences.chinese: 你不该以貌取人。

sentences.chinese: 从所有迹象来看，这个案件都像一宗简单的谋杀。

sentences.english: The pupils looked angelic – but appearances can be deceptive .
sentences.chinese: 这些学生看上去如天使一般，但外表可能是会骗人的。

sentences.english: He was, to all appearances , a respectable, successful businessman.
sentences.chinese: 从各方面看，他都是个体面而成功的商人。

sentences.english: The industry has changed greatly with the appearance of new technologies.

sentences.chinese: 她洗了衣服，然后挂出去晾干。

name: jeans
trans: n. 牛仔裤；工装裤

sentences.english: ...a young man in jeans and a worn T-shirt.
sentences.chinese: …一个穿着牛仔裤和破旧T恤衫的年轻人。

name: trousers
trans: n. 裤子，长裤

sentences.english: His trousers were slightly too short.
sentences.chinese: 他的裤子有点短。

sentences.english: I need a new pair of trousers for work.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一条上班穿的新裤子。

name: clasp
trans: n. 扣子，钩子；握手 vt. 紧抱；扣紧；紧紧缠绕 vi. 扣住

sentences.chinese: 她有力的握手

sentences.chinese: 小的珍珠纽扣

sentences.english: boxing gloves
sentences.chinese: 拳击手套

sentences.chinese: 白色的齐踝短袜

sentences.chinese: 远足靴

sentences.english: a pair of boots

sentences.chinese: 饰有蕾丝花边的手绢

sentences.english: lace curtains
sentences.chinese: 网眼窗帘

sentences.chinese: 他年轻时他父亲叫他去给一个裁缝当学徒。

sentences.chinese: 头发灰白的老太太

sentences.chinese: 这些裙子有灰色的吗？
